1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Now, who are you?

Ryan Harris: 15 years old, short brown hair, blue eyes, 5'9, Casucasian, likes to be with friends?

Josh Hamel: 16-years old, short blonde hair, blue eyes, 5'10, Casucasian, nice but a bit arrogant?
11.title: Male Teenager

choices: Something happens on the way there
111.content: You sighed with delight about the three months of summer break you have to do absolutely anything you want. Then, your parents without consulting you decide to go on vacation to Resaria, a small European country with calming country plains, and a large mountain range which cut the country right down the middle. "Uhhh" you sigh not with delight, but now with contempt instead of hanging out with your friends and doing what you want you are going to be stuck on the other side of the world with a bunch of strangers with nothing to do. You google the country for a bit of info and find that the countries heir to the throne is attending college in the town you will be visiting. http://www.fotosearch.com/bigcomp.asp::Q... You find a photo of Princess Vivavie at her Father's wedding about a year ago. "Huh, maybe this trip won't be a total loss" you think to yourself.
111.title: Vacation

choices: See where these men are taking you
1111.content: You arrived in Resaria and were somewhat disappointed at the cold and cloudy world that lay behind your airplane window. You reassure yourself and gather your bag and marvel at the large, modern airport crowded with (to you at least) an incredible amount of people. Then, suddenly as if on cue a large crowd of people hit the airport and you are separated from your family. Then, two tall men in black begin to push you out of airport doors and into a car. What do you do?
1111.title: Arrival

11111.content:
Quickly you panic at the top of your lungs trying to draw someones attention to these mysterious kidnappers. But one of them quickly covered your mouth and you were thrown into the back of a large limo. You quickly try to escape but the door was shut and locked from the outside. You looked around frantically and noticed a man sitting at the far side of the limo. He wore a black suit with a crest on the pocket. You looked at it carefully and recognized it. It was the seal to the royal family of Resaria. You were about to say something when the man stopped you.

"Hello son," he said in a heavy accent. "My name is Rauru, King of this country." You were shocked, what did the king want with you. "Recently my beloved daughter was assassinated. The event was quickly suppressed and no one knows about the situation."

"But what do you want with me?" you asked as your heart raced.

"Well you see my new wife is very sterile. I can no longer have offspring, and as such with the death of Vivavie I have no heir to the thrown and thus ending my blood line. This is where you come in, I discussed it over with my finest men and we came to a decision." he told you pulling out a small emerald sphere.

"What's that?" you ask trembling.

"When excavating a old ruined castle we found this along with an old manuscript. According to the manuscript, this orb can transform anyone into someone else." he said. You weren't sure but you knew what he was thinking. "We decided that it would be in best interest to use this to recreate my daughter."

"So why me?" you ask slightly curious as to this twist in your vacation.

"We randomly chose one young person from the airport, someone that wasn't a citizen of our country." he said.

"What about my family?" you ask.

"They will be let known that you were found dead on the side of the road. We will use this orb to make a dead person look like you." he said. This made you very nervous. You had two options, you could run or see how this unfolds.
11111.title: Scream

111111.content:
You sit there silently for a while in thought about how to escape from this.

"Well, what do you have to say?" he asked. You quickly broke the window and jumped out rolling down the side of the hill. You were bleeding from several places but you got up and ran noticing the two men from before. Your world quickly started to blur and you stumbled and slowed. You fell a few times but got back up, the pain was terrible. You finally passed out at the bottom of the hill from a loss of blood the men picked you up and carried you to the limo.

You drifted in and out of consciousness throughout the ride until you reached a large building you couldn't see it very well. One man grabbed you and quickly rushed you inside. You then passed out again.

................

Several hours later you awoke with surprise to find yourself in a large bedroom of sorts. You were still a little out of it and the world was still blurry. You stumbled your way to what seemed to be a mirror. Your chest felt heavy and you couldn't walk very well, you wrote this off as coming from your injuries. You found a vanity and leaned on it for support as you lifted your head and gazed into the mirror. You must have lost a lot of blood because in the mirror you a young women staring back at you, who was it?
111111.title: Run

1111112.content:
You couldn't tell if you were delusional from a loss of blood or if you were correct, but in your reflection you saw a short brunette girl. As your eyes started to gain focused you noticed some other things. This girl appeared to be only 12 or 13 and was barely into puberty. You looked down and confirmed it, this girl was definitely you. You seemed to be wearing a long elegant dress. It reminded you of a prom dress( http://prommafia.com/wp-content/uploads/...). You were quite confused, especially because you could still notice some of your cuts were still there and bandaged. You felt that you were about to faint again so you wondered over to a large bed and fell onto it and blacked out.

When you awoke again you noticed a bandage on your arm was very red, you examined the cut and replaced the bandage. Then a women walked in carrying a medical kit. She sat down next to you, "Don't worry princess we'll replace these bandages without a problem, you just gotta remember to not move around so much or they will open up again." the woman said. What was she talking about, you weren't the princess and you didn't look like her either. The woman re bandaged you and left.

You sat there for a while staring around the large room, you could tell that it must have been the princess' room, it was very nice and quite girly. Then you heard a clicking sound and the large doors opened and in came the king and his body guards. "What's going on? Didn't you want me to be your daughter?" you ask in a harsh tone.

"We did until the media figured out the assassination. We quickly thought up a new plan for you, you are now my new wife's long lost daughter. We told our country that we had found you in an orphanage in America and were glad that we had found you. Your name is now Princess Sophia Villara. Oh and your parents have already been informed of your...death." he said. "Unfortunately when we changed you into this girl you sustained the cuts. Do be careful not to reopen them." he said as he walked out of the room. You quickly ran after him but the door closed and locked. You sat there banging for someone to let you out, but no one came.

After a while of thinking you......
1111112.title: Someone else

11111122.content:
There was no way out of this, there were guards all over the place, you had no clue where the orb was, and you were still badly hurt. The only thing to do right now was too be Sophia until you had a better chance of escaping. You walked slowly around the room, looking at the various things in it. A large closet off the side, a large bathroom a large bed. It was all very girly and princessy. But you hated being in that dress, you had to change out. So you walked into the closet. The problem though is that there were no pants in the closet at all. You had to go with the next best thing, since you were really tired, you grabbed a nightie.(http://image3.dhgate.com/upload/20101/58...).

You slid the dress off slowly around your wounds. You got the dress off and looked at yourself, you couldn't really see your under-developed breasts because of the bandages. You were very hairless and smooth. You slid the silk nightie on and it felt good against your smooth skin. You then let your hair down from the bun it was in and walked slowly too the bed and fell asleep. When you woke up....
11111122.title: Decide to accept your fate

111111221.content:
You woke up and rubbed your eyes, that was some weird dream you thought know seeing your room. You stood up and looked down, you saw the pink silk nightie from before. Then some brown hair fell in your face. What, you thought, it wasn't a dream?! You then notice something different about your room, it was much larger, and all the stuff that was green(your favorite color) was now pink. You almost forgot your wounds!!

You looked and they were....
111111221.title: your were back home...

1111112211.content:
You were fully healed! You ran out into the hallway and your older brother walks past, he didn't seem to notice anything. Acting casual, "What day is it?" you ask.

"The first day of summer break princess!" he says with a smile on his face, then walked off. Woh this was weird, you had a dream that you turned into a princess, and now you are one. But for some reason you felt very dirty and gross, you looked around your new enlarged room and saw a bathroom. Do you take a shower or a bath?
1111112211.title: gone!

choices: you weren't ready for girly clothes yet....
hmmm, might as well act the part
11111122112.content: You quickly walked into the bathroom, it was very large, like the size of a master bath, but for a mansion. You slid the nightie off and got a good look at yourself for the first time. You had a nice body that was soft on the eyes and very cute. Your boobs weren't very big, you were only fifteen, but this didn't distract you as much as you thought it would. You slipped into the bath and it felt good on your body. You enjoyed the bath thoroughly and got out soon after you finished washing your hair, it took you forever but it was worth it. When you were fully dry your hair was some of the nicest hair you have ever seen. But you couldn't stand here in a towel forever. You had to get changed, but what to change into. You walked into a large walk in closet and decided that.....
11111122112.title: bath

111111221122.content:
Before you walked into the the closet you decided that since you were this "princess" you might as well act the part. You walked in and you were glad you made that decision, because apparently you don't own anything close to what a boy would wear. There was only dresses and skirts, satin and lace, panties and thongs, nothing close to anything "boyish". You looked all around looking for something that you would be comfortable in. You picked out a short blue skirt(http://www.girlsport.net/mambo/component...), and a longer blue and black sweater(http://www.missandmrstallclothes.com/wp-...). You then saw some ugg boots and were curious to why girls wore them so much so you wore those also(http://www.lifestyle-uggboots.com/images...).

You put it all on after you put on blue panties and a bra. Your slid the sweater on and pulled your hair out from underneath it. You looked at yourself in the mirror. You looked cute and your hair had this long natural curl to it. You walked outside into the rest of your house. Did the rest of your house change?
111111221122.title: hmmm, might as well act the part

1111112211221.content:
The house HAD changed. It turned into a large sprawling mansion. As you exited your you walked into a long hall, you walked down the hall and opened several doors. There were rooms of all kinds, at the end of the hall was a large pair of doors. When you went inside you found a large library, it didn't interest you much and you went the other way down the hall. You got to the middle and it opened up int a bridge in a large hall. There were large crystal chandeliers on the ceiling. The floor of the hall was made of marble and there was a large fountain in the middle. On the other side of the bridge were many more doors in which you would explore later. You headed down the closest side of the curled twin stairs. You explored the house finding large rooms, one was a ball room. At one end of the large hall was another very large door, the largest you had seen so far, you open it up to find a large throne room. It appears as though you are still a princess.

But what happened, why was it your family that was royalty, and why are you a girl. It was all very confusing. You walked around your large house for quite a while, you were greeted by guards and maids and assorted other workers. You had noticed several things that were rather strange, the family crest that you had seen all over the house, it was one that you had drawn for a fantasy story you were writing. Another was that you couldn't figure out where this mansions was. You had walked out onto the back deck and saw a large forest behind the mansion. From the outside you could tell the this mansion was designed to look like a castle from the outside, you saw several towers and thought that you would find a way to them later.

You kept looking for clues as to what happened to you when a servant girl ran up to you. "Lady Sophie, your mother is looking for you." she said as she bowed. It appears as though you kept the name from the dream you had, Sophie Villara. You followed the girl to your mother, she hugged you good morning and let the servant girl go. "Hey mom, whats up?" you asked trying to play the part.

"Oh I just wanted to tell you about...."
1111112211221.title: Yes

choices: An small older town, with cobblestone roads and tightly packed buildings.
11111122112211.content:
"We are planning a ball?" you asked.

"Yes of course, you've known about it for a while, it was your idea! Are you alright sweetie." it was weird, she looked like your mother but she was different somehow.

"Oh yea, now I remember, the ball." you told her.

"Yea and I wanted to tell you that we will be holding it on the Autumn Equinox, in honor of the Autumn festival." she told you. "would you like to go find a dress with me later."

"Sure!" you told her. You hugged her again and left the room, you had to figure out more about this world, and how you got here. You walked around till you found a room with a large map on the wall. It was a map of some country you had never heard of, Ferrenia. There was a star on the map, you found it to be the capital city and the city you must live by because of the large forest to the south. The city was the city of Lucenna. On a desk was a globe, the globe looked nothing like earth, it was strange. None of the continents looked the same.

You could tell by the large desk and decor of the room that this must be your fathers office. You left and headed back to your room. It had changed while you were gone, it grew in sized, the girly decor was the same. But it was much more extravagant. The bed was queen sized, with four large posts and white drapes hanging around it. Whatever happened must not have finished till you left your room. As you looked out the large windows in the back of the room, you heard a knock at the door and told them to come in. It was the servant girl from before, bowing as she spoke. "Your mother requests your audience in the main hall." She said and you followed her downstairs to the main hall. She said it was time to go look for a dress and you agreed. Before you left your mother asked you why you weren't wearing your tiara. Just as soon as she said this the servant girl ran up to you holding a tiara out to you. You grabbed it and placed it on your head, apparently you are required to wear it whenever you go out. It was covered in diamonds and light pink stones of some kind.

You hopped into the back of the limo following your mother and you drove towards town. What kind of city was Lucenna?
11111122112211.title: the ball we are planning

111111221122112.content:
As you arrived in town you started to learn something about this world, it was very similar to modern times on earth in the way people dressed and technology. But the culture was very similar to older europe, a monarchy running the country and towns were smaller a designed like old europe.

The Limo stopped in front a shop that advertised fancy dresses. You exited the limo after your mother and entered the store. The store owner bowed to you and welcomed you to his store. Apparently you have been here many times and were friends with the store owner. You walked around and looked at several dresses your mother was pointing out. She finally found one the you had approved of, despite you being a guy trapped in a girls body in some strange world. You were surprisingly accepting of all this, you were even getting into shopping with your altered mother. She handed you the dress and you went into a dressing room, the theme of the dance was fall so you were going with a very fall color, (http://www.bayliy.com/images/uplode/chea...).

Despite being a very poofy dress you liked it. It seemed very princessy and your mother enjoyed it as well. The color of the dress was also the color the national tree turned in the fall. You changed back into your blue outfit and gave the dress to your mother who payed for it and her dress. You walked back to the limo and went home. You went and looked for your dad, who was being trying on his tux, your brother was being fitted for his. You talked to him for a while to try and find out more about this world. Apparently it was a very peaceful world. You and the neighboring nation were the world powers and had very good relations. But you couldn't figure out how you got here, and how you became Sophie Villara, princess of Ferrenia.

The Ball was in two days....
111111221122112.title: An small older town, with cobblestone roads and...

choices: "So ryan, how is being a princess?"
"So Sophie, how is the ball so far?"
1111112211221121.content:
You woke up to the sun filtering through the curtains covering your large windows. You had been living as Sophie Villara, princess of Ferrenia for three days now and couldn't care less that you were a girl. You had given up trying to find your way back to being Ryan Harris, average 15 year old. To the cute and beloved princess. You opened the curtains, and gazed at the colorful Autumn forest outside. You turned around, your nightie twirling as you did, it was something you enjoyed, and sat down in the vanity. Some things that didn't change were your age, you were still fifteen, still going through puberty. Your eyes were still blue, your hair was still light brown. But of course there were some things that were different, you were a girl of course. You had b-sized breasts and you had quite the hourglass figure for your young age. You were smaller than you used to be, you had shrunk 5 inches and were now 5 foot 4. You walked into your marble floored bathroom and proceeded to take a shower, you had gotten used to washing and conditioning your long, shoulder length hair. After you got out you proceeded to change into a pair of light pink panties and matching bra. You then slid into a black sweater dress and tights. You then put on some ugg boots and placed your hair into a pony tail. You sat down at your vanity and a servant came in to do your makeup. It was something you were glad you didn't have to learn to do. You headed down stairs to the dinning room to eat breakfast, your brother was eating his food, when he was done he gave you a hug and left. You mother joined you while eating breakfast, your father was busy organizing the ball. You had enjoyed the changes to your family, your brother was no longer a jerk to you, and your mother was like one of your best friends. Your father was nice and got you things all the time. When you finished you made your way into the ball room, everyone was hurrying this way and that, it was hectic. But all the work was wonderful, the ball room looked amazing. A the far end were two large thrones flanked by the smaller ones for your brother and yourself.

As you left the ballroom the girl servant, whom's name you found to be Lisanna, came up to you and told you the hair dresser was here and waiting for you. You followed her back to your room and sat down at the vanity, the hair dresser kissed you on the cheek, you replied in kind, and she proceeded to do your hair, she curled it in long yet tight curls and put it up in a bun.

.......

The ball started in an hour and you proceeded to get into your dress. When you were done, Lisanna came to get you saying all the guests had arrived and it was your family's turn to enter. You stood next to your father, who had your mother to his left and your brother to her left. The large ballroom doors swung open and a man said, "Presenting the Royal family, George, Anna, John, and Sophie Villara!" You walked towards the thrones at the front of the room and took your seat, sitting like a pleasant young princess. Your father made a speech and the ball began, people started to dance. A young man walked towards you, your father introduced him as the Prince of the neighboring country, his name was Alphonse Rosch. He had dirty blonde hair and had dark green eyes. Something was familiar about him. He kissed your hand and asked you to dance, you smiled and blushed and agreed. He lead you to the dance floor and you both started to dance. It was a few minutes before he said anything, but when he did, he said. "......"
1111112211221121.title: the day of the ball

11111122112211211.content:
You were shocked when he said this and pulled him out of the ballroom.

"Who are you, how do you know my real name?" you practically yell.

"Calm down let me explain. My real name is princess Vivavae, of Resaria back on earth." she told you.


"But your father said you were assassinated!"

"That was a ruse. You see, I never enjoyed being a princess very much, I wanted a change of pace. Thats when my fathers archaeologists found the emerald sphere, needless to say I did a little more research than my father did. The sphere can not change you into just anyone, it changes you into your from an alternate dimension. Basically you really are in your own body, the body of the you of this world Sophie Villara, Princess of Ferrenia. What I did, is fake my own death, my father paniced and kidnapped a random person, that being you. Once he switched you with your alternate body, he was stunned that you didn't turn into me. This gave me my chance to steel the emerald sphere. I just played around with it and eventually it through our souls into the alternate dimension, where you are a princess, and I am a prince.

You were stunned, this was one smart person to be able to pull all that off.

"It looks like it payed off too, because you make one super cute princess!" he told you, you blushed.

"Is there a way back." you ask her.
11111122112211211.title: "So ryan, how is being a princess?"

111111221122112111.content:
"No, the emerald sphere stayed back on earth." he told you.

Surprisingly, you were fine with it. Even though you liked your old life, this life was much better, you were rich, people loved you, and best of all you could be someone completely different!

"So what do we do now?" you asked him.

"Well the reason my family was invited to this ball was because your father wanted to set up a marriage between you and I. I suggest we go back into the ballroom as well before people get suspicious."

You agreed, he grasped your hand and you walked into the room together. As you stepped in your father made the announcment, that you were to marry Prince Alphonse. It made sense, it seemed like this kinda cultures thing to do. What did you think of it?
111111221122112111.title: no

1111112211221121111.content:
You liked the Idea, you enjoyed being a princess! You didn't mind that you were getting married, your fiance was a Cute prince! You would be rich for the rest of your life.

Everyone was clapping as you and Prince Alphonse walked in holding hands, people were congratulating you, it was a little weird though that you were getting married at 15, but at you were so caught up in the moment that you didn't care. The party kept going and you talked to many people, and even met your best friend. She was a blonde haired girl, with hazel eyes. Slightly taller than yourself, her name was Ashelynn. By her appearance and her general attitude she was this worlds version of your old best friend, Mike. You had invited her to stay here with you, at least for the night to celebrate your engagement. While you partied the rest of the night, you had found out that the wedding was to be held a few days before Christmas, giving you two months exactly to have everything read. Your honeymoon would also be held over christmas in a cottege in the mountains. They said cottage but that didn't mean it would be small.

...........

The party was done and the servants were cleaning up the the ball room. You and Ashelynn headed up towards your bedroom. As soon as you got there you undid your hair and let it fall down below your shoulders, you also placed your diamond and pink stone tiara on the vanity. You then lead Ashelynn to the large closet, you each took off your dresses, and hung them up, your orange one next to her pink one. You told her she could borrow some of her pajamas, surprisingly she picked, (http://cdn1.iofferphoto.com/img/item/148...). You weren't quite sure why she chose lingerie, but you rolled with it and chose an almost exact copy but orange.

What do you do?
1111112211221121111.title: its good

11111122112211211111.content:
It had gotten quite late while you two were talking, you had learned a lot about Ashelynn, and a little about the new you as well. A while back your mom had sent Lisanna, your servant girl, to tell you to get some sleep. So you turned the lights off, but you lit some candles so as not to be noticed but still to be able to see each other.

"I can't beleive your getting married in 2 months!!" Ashelynn whispered loudly.

"I know its crazy!"

"And Alphonse is so cute!!" she told you. You both giggled. You had completely fallen into your new life now, you were for all intents and puproses now Princess Sophie Villara of Ferrenia. Of course you asked Ashelynn to be your maid of honor at your up and coming wedding.

"You know what we have to do now right?" she asks.

"no, what?"

"We have to celebrate your last days as a single girl!!" she told you.
11111122112211211111.title: talk for a while

111111221122112111112.content:
You were confused as she crawled slowy towards. But as you were about to find out, in this world, instead of bachelorette parties, you were to get intimate with your best friend. It was strange, when you were male you had always dreamed of lesbians getting it on, but now that you were a girl you weren't sure you would enjoy it. This would explain why she put on the lingerie pajamas, and that she didn't question your choice of pajamas.

"I.....I don't....know Ashelynn...." you said hesitantly.

"Don't worry, its tradition!" she said. Finally your male self returned for a last hurrah and you gave in. She told you to go lay on the bed, she herself followed you up and you began to get very, very intimate.

........

After a while you lay under the covers of your large queen sized bed, you on your side with Ashelynns arms wrapped around you. You slowely fell to sleep.


In the morning.....
111111221122112111112.title: she comes closer to you

1111112211221121111121.content:
You woke up in the morning, slightly drowse yet. You rolled over and noticed no one in the bed, you sat up and saw Ashelynn in your closet, picking out your outfit for the day. She was going to be your Maid of Honor, and part of her duties were to assist you in everything until the day of the wedding. You got up and hopped in the shower, when you were done you put on the outfit she had lain out for you. It was a chilly October day, and once again you were wearing orange. You figured it was this version of you's favorite color. So you put on the outfit and sat at the vanity while Ashelynn did your hair and makeup. Afterwords she gave you your tiara and a purse, you were going to start planning your wedding. The first thing you were going to do was meet with your Groom, who was previously Princess Vivavae, but was now Prince Alphonse. You were going to choose where to hold the wedding.

....

You headed out to meet Vivavae, and you sat down and talked about where to get married. It came down to two choices.
1111112211221121111121.title: Act like nothing happened....

11111122112211211111212.content: You chose the courtyard, despite the fact that it will be winter during the ceremony. You loved the courtyard of the castle it was large and it would be beautifully decorated with Christmas lights. You thought it would be romantic for snow to gently be falling while the ceremony was going on. After the two of you decided on that, she kissed you goodbye and you went to the dress store with your mother and Ashelynn to find a dress. You found one that would keep you warm and would be beautiful. http://www.bridalonlinestore.com/store/i... , the cape was completely fur lined and would keep you warm till the reception where you would take it off and show your dress to everyone. What happens next....

1111112211222.content: And for some funny reason the rest of the house still looked the same like you left it before you went to this awful and life changing trip. You step down and nearly fall with those boots and you also start to sweat with your long top and those boots, since it is summer like your brother said, today the summer break starts, which means enjoying the sun and the nearby beach….

111112.content:
You know that you can't run away from them because they're big and strong . They also have a car and weapon.
If you're trying to run , they won't be happy .
So you decide to see what happen and maybe after that they'll let their guard down and you'll find a way to escape from this situation. Thinking about this and your family and your friends too.What if you won't be able to see your family and your friend anymore.

111112.title: See what happens

11112.content:
As the two men lead you out of the airport, you say, "Where are you taking me?"

Leading you to a large black limo, one of the men says, "We're taking you to the Royal Palace."

"Why?"

Opening the door, the other man says, "Everything will be explained on the way."

Realizing you didn't have a choice, you relucantly get into the car. After sitting down, you look around the limo and notice a man sitting across from you. Looking at him carefully, you recognize him as Anatoli, the King of Resaria. You were about to say something when he stopped you.

With a thick accent, he says, "Hello son, welcome to Resaria. I'm King Anatoli."

"It...its an honor your majesty. Pardon me, but," hesitating, you say, "Why am I here?"

Getting up, Anatoli sits down next to you. "You are here to help me solve a very dire problem in my family?"

"How? Do you want me to marry one of your daughters?"

"No son," laughing, Anatoli says, "I want you to become one of my daughters."
11112.title: See where these men are taking you

choices: They will be informed of your death
They have already been made aware
111121.content:
You weren't sure if you'd heard Anatoli correctly, "Excuse me?"

"My newest wife has a genetic disorder that makes her incapable of having children. That, of course, means that I will have no more children to carry on my blood line."

Growing concerned, you say, "How does that involve me?"

Taking, what looked to be, an emerald sphere from his pocket, Anatoli says, "We recently discovered this, along with an old manuscript, at an archaelogical site on the castle grounds. According to the manuscript, this orb can transform anyone into someone else," pausing, he says, "Using this, we're going to turn you into my daughter."

You were surprised, after hearing that, to find that you weren't frightended by what you just heard. "Why me?"

"We picked you out, randomly, at the airport; because you're not a citizen of this country."

"They will be informed that you were found dead outside of the airport; having been run over while hailing a cab," pausing, he says, "We shall use the amulet to turn a recently deceased body into yours."

Unable to cope with the fact that the life you knew was over, you blacked out.

You regain consciousness a few hours later. Opening your eyes, you're surprised to discover that you're in a rather large bedroom. Sitting up, after your vision clears, you get a look at your surroundings. You find yourself sitting a king sized canopy bed in a room that definetly for a girl. Looking around you spot an open closet with, to your dismay, many dresses and other feminie outfits.

I just need you to be my daughter for six months, that way we can have a marriage and make everything seem legitimate to the public. To sweeten the deal, we will treat you as how you would like as long as you act as how a princess should at official ceremonies. That means no girlish furnishing, no girlish clothing, American video games, American movies, no people trying to do anything "real" to you, no twisting your mind with certain techniques of ours, and etc. The suitor knows this as well. Now, will please help us?" Anatoli pleads.

Being a school day, you woke up from bed. "Another day" you say as you get up and get ready for school.

After showering, getting clean clothes, and your school stuff, you head downstairs and have a small breakfast. So far, it was just an ordinary Tuesday.

In your backpack is your social studies assignment. It is a two thousand word essay that was about the life of a female heir. It is a narrow subject, but with the help of your laptop (also in your bag) researching was a breeze. You finished it one Saturday and today was only Tuesday.

You think it odd but nothing else, you keep walking until something caught your eye on the ground, you saw a ten dollar bill. Sweet, you thought as bent over to pick it up, must be my lucky day. Just as you stood up the girl ran right into you and you both fell to the ground.

"Here!" she said and put her tiara on your head. She then stood and ran off, but the weird part is she seemed to morph and contort the farther she got. You then turn to hear yelling and two large men running at you. You quickly step out of the way but trip on something, it was like a large piece of fabric. you fell to the ground and lay there on your back. You look down as you slowly get up, you were shocked at what you saw, two large mounds covered up by a very fancy dress.(http://www.roxx-online.com/roxxonline/im...). You quickly panicked and stood up, by that time the two men had gotten too one of them threw you over your shoulder the other gagged and blindfolded you. They threw you into a limo a drove off, when they took the blindfold off you were at a....

112111222.content: And when the took away the blindfolds again you find yourself, still wearing this strange fancy blue dress at a large convention and you are not feeling well, because….
112111222.title: large convention

11212.content:
My name is Josh Hamel; I’m 16 years old and a junior in High School. I live at home with my parents and my younger brother. My best friend is a girl named Megan Hutchinson; we’ve been pretty much inseparable since we were 6 years old. When I’m not hanging out with Megan or playing video games, the only social activity I take part in is the History Club at school.

Now that all that’s out of the way, I guess you probably want me to start my story. It all started on the last day of school; classes had just ended but I couldn’t leave yet, because of an important History Club meeting.

I walked down the hall to the room where the club met; walking in to find most everyone was already there. I quickly found a seat next to Megan as Mr. Jacobs, the faculty advisor, walked into the room with some folders in his hands. “Okay folks, tomorrow is the big day.” Closing the door, he said, “Our flight to Verthaven leaves at 5:30 tomorrow morning; so make sure you’re all at the airport by 3 AM.”

As Mr. Jacobs walked down the rows, handing out folders with trip information, Megan leaned over to me and said, “You excited about the trip?”

“Totally excited; I could definitely use a vacation.” Looking at her, I said, “How about you?”

“Same here; I can’t wait to have a vacation.” Looking at me, a frown on her face, Megan said, “There’s one thing I’m not looking forward to, though.”

“Oh, what’s that?”

“That Gala we got invited to at the Palace; the one for the Kingdoms Bicentennial.” Looking at me, Megan said, “I'm not looking forward to wearing one of those frou-frous, Disney Princess ball gowns.”

I suppose I should mention that Megan is the definition of a tomboy; the girliest outfit I’d ever seen her in was a skirt for picture day in 7th grade. “Oh come, I don’t think it’ll be that bad.”

“Really?” pulling out her phone, Megan showed me some photos, “Would you want to wear one of those?”

I looked at the photos on Megan’s phone; the dresses looked very extravagant. “Yeah, I’m not sure I’d like to wear one of those.”
At that point, Mr. Jacobs had arrived at our section. He must’ve spotted the photos on Megan’s phone, because he said, “Now remember, I’ve made arrangements for you all to be fitted for your Gala attire.”

The meeting ended a short time later; with Megan and me amongst the last to leave. As we walked out of the building, Megan said, "I'll see you tomorrow morning, Josh."

"See you then, Meg!"
11212.title: Last Day of School

112121.content:
We were about four hours into the flight; I was watching a movie on my phone while Megan sat next to me surfing the internet. There was 90 minutes to go before we landed in Klapava, the capital city of Verthaven.

Having paused the movie, I turned to look out the window at the mountains below. I was still looking out the window when I felt someone tap my shoulder. Turning to look at Megan, I said, “What’s up?”

“I found something interesting I think you should see.”

After Megan placed her tablet on my tray table, I looked closer to find out she was looking at photos of Princess Catherine; the Crown Princess of Verthaven. “Why are you showing me photos of the Princess?” confused, I said, “I mean she’s attractive, but she’s also way out of my league.”

“That’s not why I’m showing these to you, dummy.” Sighing, Megan zoomed in on the Princess’ face. “Take a look at her face; if it wasn’t for the fact that you were a boy, you’d look almost exactly like her.”

I looked closer at the photos and realized Megan was right; I was almost a spitting image of Princess Catherine, we had the same smile and nearly identical hair color. Had I been born a girl, we probably would’ve been confused for twins. “Oh wow, that is so weird.” Chuckling, I said, “You think I should mention that to her at the Gala?”

With a smile, Megan said, “You totally should, I think she’d get a kick out of it.”

****************************


The rest of the flight passed without incident; I tried my best to get some sleep since I’d been awake since around 1:30 this morning. I was jarred awake but the sound of the pilot announced we’d started our descent. Megan and I both turned to look out the window as the city came into view.

While not very large, or modern, like other European cities, Klapava was still home to about 500,000 people. As we flew over the city, towards the airport, I found myself focusing on the Royal Palace in the center of the city; nestled between rows of trees on all sides.

After we got off the plane, the group made its way to the Customs checkpoint. Everyone was going through quickly, and without a problem; so you can imagine my surprise when some guy in a suit approached me as I waited in line. With a thick accent, the man said, “Are you, Josh Hamel?”

“Yes.” Suddenly feeling worried, I said, “Can I help you?”

“You need to come with me.”

Not sure what to do, I quickly obliged and followed the man towards a nearby door. Mr. Jacobs, having seen what was going on, came running over. “What’s going on here? Where are you going with my student?”

“I’m with airport security.” Looking at Mr. Jacobs, the man said, “Mr. Hamel’s passport was flagged as suspicious; we need to interview him.”

Looking at me as I walked past, Mr. Jacobs said, “You’ll be fine, Josh; you’ve done nothing wrong.”
112121.title: Arriving in Verthaven

1121211.content:
I still wasn’t quite sure what was happening as the man led me down a hallway to a small room. Walking inside, I saw another man sitting on the other side of a table. He gestured for me to have a seat as the other man sat down next to him. Looking at me, in a similar accent to the first man, the second man said, “Hello Mr. Hamel, my name is Franz Gerhardt; and this is my associate, Jonas Fischer. We’re with the Royal Protection Service; similar to the US Secret Service.”

“It’s nice to meet you both, I guess.” Getting nervous, I said, “You mind telling me why I’m here?”

“Your passport was flagged by our system as being a potential security risk.” Looking at me, Mr. Fischer said, “With your group attending the Bicentennial Gala, we must ensure that you won’t pose a threat to the Royal Family.”

“Look, I think this all a big mistake.” Pausing, I said, “I’m not a criminal; the worst thing I’ve ever done is steal some candy when I was 7.”

“Forgive us if we don’t take your word for that.” Taking a breath, Mr. Gerhardt said, “We’re going to ask you some questions; it would be best if you answered them truthfully.”

“It’s not like you’re giving me much of a choice.”

*************************


The questions lasted almost 45 minutes; with topics ranging from my extracurricular activities all the way to my home life. The questions seemed pretty straight forward until they started asking about my family.

“How supportive would your family be if you were to stay here for a prolonged period?”

Looking at Mr. Gerhardt, I said, “What does that have to do with me being a security threat?”

“Please just answer the question, Mr. Hamel; we’re almost finished here.”

“Okay fine.” Sighing, I said, “I guess they’d be supportive; but not if I were to stay too long.”

Mr. Gerhardt exchanged a look with Mr. Fischer before turning back to me. “That’s all we needed to know, Mr. Hamel.”

“Thank god.” Getting up, I said, “Now I can finally start my vacation.”

“There is one more thing, Mr. Hamel.” Holding a camera, Mr. Fischer said, “We just need to take some photos for your file.”

The photos took another 10 minutes; as they were from every conceivable angle. When they were finally finished and I was able to leave, I looked at them and said, “Thanks for ruining my trip before it even started.”
1121211.title: The Interview

11212111.content:
I got more than a few angry looks as I made my way to the baggage claim area. It seemed some of my classmates were angry that I’d held them up at the airport; with only Mr. Jacobs and Megan showing concern.

I spent 5 minutes assuring Mr. Jacobs that everything was fine; it was all just some misunderstanding. Once he walked off, Megan came over with my luggage. “You should’ve heard some of the others talking.” Handing my suitcase to me, Megan said,
“They were joking around about how you were some terrorist or something.”

As Megan and I followed the group outside, I said, “Those two men said the same thing; I kept telling them they had me confused for someone else.” Looking at Megan, I said, “The weirdest thing was they asked me some really unusual questions and took photos of my face from all sorts of angles.”

“That is weird.” As the shuttle arrived for the trip to the hotel, Megan said, “But don’t let that ruin your trip.”

The ride to the hotel, a high-class hotel a few blocks from the palace, was pretty uneventful. If you’re wondering why a group of high school students was staying at a ritzy hotel; in addition to invitations to the gala, the palace also offered to pay for the hotel for the week.

I was looking out the window at the scenery when I suddenly started to feel queasy. Taking a look at me, Megan said, “Are you okay, Josh?”

“I’m fine; just feeling a little nauseous all of a sudden.”

************************


We got to the hotel a short time later; after giving us a talk about behaving in a foreign country, Mr. Jacobs let us all go off to do what we wanted. My nausea hadn’t subsided at all; if anything it was getting worse.
Megan helped me up to my room; where she lay me down on the bed. “I’ll be right back; I’m going to find Mr. Jacobs.”

“I’m not going anywhere.”

Megan quickly left the room and closed the door behind her. I lay on the bed for a few minutes fighting the urge to throw up. I was brought back to reality by the sound of someone knocking on my door. Sitting up, I was confused – because I’d given Megan a copy of my room key. Not for the reason you’re all thinking.

Getting up, I slowly walked to the door and opened it – only to find 3 masked individuals standing there. Before I could do anything, one of them grabbed me while another put a rag over my face. The last thing I saw before losing consciousness was the trio carrying me down the stairs.
11212111.title: At the Hotel

112121111.content:
I had weird dreams through the night, most of them involving people in robes chanting. At one point, I think I saw a naked girl with my face coming toward me.

I woke to bright sunlight streaming through my window. I remembered Megan going to get Mr. Jacobs, but where were they? Even if Mr. Jacobs had blown her off, I would have thought Megan would keep me company. "Megan... ?" My voice sounded... off.

Slowly, excruciatingly slowly, my eyes began to adjust to the light. As I looked around, one thing became clear: this was not my room.

I relaxed. I had been sick. This must be a hospital room. That would explain why Megan and Mr. Jacobs weren't in the room with me. I lay there, picturing the reaction to the news that I was sick. "First Customs, now this. If you didn't want to come, why didn't you just stay home?"

I sat up, and realized that my stomach felt better. I also saw how fancy this room was. Way too fancy to be a hospital room. "What the... ?" Again, my voice didn't sound like mine anymore.

I looked down, and couldn't believe what I saw. Breasts?

I got out of bed, and saw a full-length mirror. Walking up to it, I saw the closest thing to a familiar sight. My face was the same. Everything else about me, however, was a girl's.

I remembered Megan showing me the princess's picture, and commenting on how much alike she and I looked. Now, we were even closer in appearance. Identical, I'd say.
112121111.title: Waking Up

112121112.content:
“The resemblance certainly is striking; they could easily pass for twins.”

I slowly regained consciousness as two people, a man and a woman, were having a conversation. It was the man who’d just spoken; with the woman replying. “I still don’t believe this is an acceptable option, Harold.”

The woman spoke with a British accent while the man had an eastern European one. “We don’t have much choice, Elena; imagine the uproar if the country learned she was missing so close to the Bicentennial Gala.”

I opened my eyes at this point to find two figures standing nearby. As my vision cleared, I realized I was in a hospital room; with a well-dressed middle-aged couple standing at the foot of the bed. “What’s going on?”

Giving the man a look, the woman walked over to me. “Hello Joshua, my name is Elena and this is my husband Harold.” With a smile, Elena said, “We’re the King and Queen of Verthaven.”

I suddenly remembered feeling quite nauseous earlier. “Why are you in my hospital room?”

Looking at me, the King said, “We have a problem, Joshua; our daughter, Princess Catherine has gone missing.”

“I’m sorry to hear that, but what does that have to do with me?” confused, I said, “Do you need my help finding her or something?”

“Not exactly.” Taking a breath, the King said, “We would like for you to take her place until she’s found.”
112121112.title: At The Hospital

1121211121.content:
“Could you say that again, please?”

Looking at me, the King said, “We want you to take our daughter’s place until she’s found.”

That’s what I thought you said. “You do realize that I’m a boy, right?” Looking at them both, I said, “How could you possibly expect me to take your daughter’s place?”

Retrieving a tablet from a nearby table, the King handed it to me. Looking at it, I saw some of the photos from my airport interview. I watched as the images began to change; transforming my features into that of the princess. Looking at the King, I said, “There was never a problem with my passport was there?”

“No, there wasn’t.” looking at me, the King said, “Once we learned you were coming to Verthaven, we needed a way to separate you from the group. A mild toxin was put into the water you drank; enough to unsettle your stomach and keep you in your hotel room.”

That brought back memories of the three masked figures forcibly taking me from the room. Looking at them, I said, “You still haven’t explained how I’m supposed to take your daughter's place.”

“You’ll be injected with nanites that were designed to turn you into Catherine.” Looking at me, the King said, “Once it’s complete, you’ll be her down to the genetic level.”

“Do you realize how insane that sounds?” scoffing, I said, “I’m a guy; you expect me to impersonate a princess?”

Walking towards me, the Queen took my hand and said, “I realize it’s asking a lot, but we don’t have any other options.”

“Forgive me if I don’t believe you.” Pausing, I said, “Let’s say I go along with this; how long will I be Catherine, and will I be a guy again when it’s done?”

“You’ll be filling in for her for, at most, a month.” Looking at me, the King said, “After which you’ll be returned to your rightful gender and handsomely compensated for your help.”

Everything was starting to make sense now; especially the unusual questions I’d been given during the interview. “Will my parents be informed of this?”

“Only if you want them to; otherwise they’ll simply believe you decided to stay for a while.”

“What if I don’t agree with this?”

“I’m afraid we can’t let that happen.” Looking at me, the King said, “Regardless of your decision, you’ll be leaving here as our daughter.”

As I lay on the bed, I realized that I was in a bind – no matter what I said, I was going to be a girl. I guess the only question was whether or not I’d go willingly. Taking a deep breath, I said, “Okay, I’ll do it.”
1121211121.title: An Explanation

11212111211.content:
The Queen stayed with me as the King went to get the doctor. I had to admit that despite my limited interactions with both of them; I realized I liked the Queen more than her husband. She actually seemed to show genuine concern about what they were asking me. She was a rather attractive woman; perhaps in her late 30s. She was wearing a v-neck dress that showed just a hint of cleavage.

“I want to thank you, Josh; for consenting to this.” Looking at me, the Queen said, “You’re putting your own life on hold to help us. I can’t thank you enough for that.”

“It’s only for a month; besides it’s not like I have to worry about school or anything.”

“Actually I’m afraid my husband was being a tad generous when he told you it would only be a month.” Taking a breath, the Queen said, “You could be like this for quite a bit longer; depending on how quickly we find Catherine.”

I got a little nervous when I heard that; I was okay being a girl for a short time, but the possibility that I’d be one for an extended period was a little unnerving. “I suppose there’s one good thing to come from all of this; spending all this time as a girl will help me to better understand them.”

“I suppose that’s one way to look at it.” Smiling, the Queen said, “You really are a remarkable young man, Josh; when this is over I’d very much like to tell your parents how much I appreciate what you did.”

“I’m sure they’d love to meet both of you.” Pausing, I said, “If you don’t mind my asking; what happened to your daughter?”

“She attends an all-girls boarding school just outside London.” Looking at me, she said, “A few days ago, after returning home for the Gala, she complained of stomach cramps. Out of an abundance of caution, we brought her here to be checked out.”

“Let me guess, something happened to her here at the hospital?”

“We’re not sure how they did it, but three masked men took her from her room in the dead of night.” Taking a deep breath, the
Queen said, “Our only communication with them was a request for 5 million Euros.”

“I guess I’m here to cover for her while you get her back?”

“That’s correct.” Looking at me, the Queen said, “You’ll fulfill all her social obligations while our security forces try to find her.”

“I must say, you’re treating me much differently than your husband is.” With a sigh, I said, “He seems to view me as nothing more than a tool; while you’re treating me like a human being.”

“I’m afraid that’s just Harold’s personality.” Looking at me, the Queen said, “I’m sure that, given time, he’ll come around.”

As if on cue, the King returned with a Doctor; who had two syringes in his hands. Walking up to me, the Doctor said, “Now Josh, I’m going to inject you with a muscle relaxer first so you won’t feel any discomfort.” Looking at me, he said, “Once I inject the nanites, the first changes to occur will be your breasts developing.”

As the doctor injected the muscle relaxer, jokingly, I said, “I suppose it’s too late for me to back out now, right?”
11212111211.title: Getting Ready

112121112111.content:
The doctor wasn’t kidding when he said the first changes would be my breasts developing; I went from being flat chested to a C cup in a matter of minutes. I had to resist the urge to play with them as my face started to get all tingly. I’ll check them out later on.

I could feel my hair getting longer as the Queen walked into the room. Seeing me, she said, “You seem to be coming along nicely, Josh.”

“Thanks, I guess.”

“There was something I wanted to ask you before my husband came in.” sitting next to me, she said, “If we were to contact your family, how do you think they’d react to this?”

“I don’t think they’d react very well at all.” My voice started changing at this point; getting higher and developing an English accent. “They’re very protective of my brother and me; I spent weeks convincing them that I would be okay on this trip.”

“I see.” Sighing, the Queen said, “How would you recommend we explain this to them?”

“Before you do anything, I’d suggest you get legal protection.” Looking at the Queen, my voice now that of a young British girl, I said, “My dad’s a lawyer. I can guarantee he’s not going to like that you did this to me without parental consent.”

“I suppose we’ll, as the Americans say, cross that bridge when we come to it.”

By that point in the transformation, I was a girl from the waist up. While the doctor assured me I wouldn’t feel any pain or discomfort, I did feel a weird sensation when my penis turned itself into a vagina. It wasn’t long after that that the changes finished; I was no longer Josh Hamel – I was now Catherine, Crown Princess of Verthaven.

Once the muscle relaxers wore off, and with some help from the Queen, I climbed out of bed to look at myself in the mirror. I had to admit that the princess, or rather I, was a very attractive girl. I could no longer resist the urge to feel my breasts; as my hands went up to grab them through the hospital gown. I played with them for a moment until I realized the Queen was still in the room.

Removing my hands, blushing, I said, “Sorry, I’ve just never had breasts before.”

“No need to apologize to me; I’d be doing the same thing if I were in your position.” Looking at me, she said, “I suppose now I should mention that, from here on out, you’ll have to answer to the name Catherine.”

“I understand.” Looking at her, I said, “You’ll forgive me if I’m not quite ready to call either of you mom or dad?”

“That’s completely understandable.” Smiling, she said, “Take as much time as you want...Catherine.”

"I suppose I should have asked this before; but why choose me instead of another girl?"

"We were desperate; afraid that word would leak out to the press." looking at me, the Queen said, "We would have preferred to use a girl, but then we saw how similar your facial structure was to Catherine's."

****************************


The King returned a few minutes later; walking into the room carrying a garment bag. “I’m glad to see the procedure was a success.” Handing me the bag, he said, “Please get dressed; we’ll be leaving for the Palace shortly.”

I was about to go into the bathroom when the Queen placed a hand on my shoulder and turned me around. “This young man just made a tremendous sacrifice for us, Harold.” Pausing, she said, “I would think that deserves a little gratitude.”

“I suppose you’re right, Elena.” Turning to me, the King said, “Thank you, Joshua, for your assistance in this matter.”

It wasn’t the best thank you I’ve ever received, but it was good enough. After the King left, I turned to the Queen and said, “This was his idea in the first place; you’d think he could be a little more sincere with his gratitude.”

“Forgive him, Catherine; your...father is under a lot of stress.”

I spent a little while in the bathroom just standing naked in front of the mirror; getting a good look at my new body. Other than the one time I accidentally saw Megan getting changed into her bathing suit, this was the first time I’d seen a girl’s naked body. I just never figured it would be mine.

I eventually got around to putting on the dress; which was similar to the Queens, only this one stopped just above my knees and was red in color. It definitely did nothing to hide my new figure; if anything I accentuated it. It then came time to put in the heels that were included in the bag as well.

I took my first careful steps before walking out into the room. Seeing me, the Queen said, “You look lovely, Catherine.” Smiling, she said, “How do you feel?”

For some reason, I couldn’t shake the feeling that this felt...well, right. Looking at her, I said, “It’s certainly not as weird as I thought it would be.”

“Come now, your father is waiting downstairs.”

After taking one last look at myself in the mirror, I followed the Queen out the door and into my new life.
112121112111.title: The Procedure

1121211121111.content:
The ride to the Palace was about as uneventful as I’d thought it would be. There were a handful of reporters outside the hospital waiting to catch a glimpse of the Princess...me leaving. The King and Queen did their best to shield me from the cameras as they ushered me into the limo.

As we drove through the city streets, the King looked at me and said, “As far as the staff at the palace is concerned, you’re the real Princess Catherine.” Pausing, he said, “We’d appreciate it if you didn’t tell them otherwise.”

“Of course your Majesty.”

It seemed the King was about to say something; until the Queen said, “Harold, dear, give her time. She’s not ready to call us Mom and Dad.”

“In that case, your Majesty is acceptable.” Looking at me, he said, “There are some rules we want you to follow.”

“What kind of rules?”

“In light of what’s happened, you’re not permitted to leave the Palace grounds. We can’t afford to let anything happen to you.” Sighing, he said, “Secondly; we expect you to act as though you really are our daughter; take part in her hobbies, use her mannerisms.”

The Queen took one look at me and said, “I’ll help you with all that, Catherine.”

“Thank you.”

We arrived at the Palace gates a few minutes later; to find a large crowd by the gates. It reminded me of the tourists congregating outside of Buckingham Palace. They were probably hoping for a chance to spot the King, Queen and me. As we drove through the gate, into a small wooded area, I caught my first glimpse of the Palace in the distance. It was truly a spectacular sight; I couldn’t believe that I was going to be living there.

Once the limo arrived at the main entrance, some servants came to help us all out. One of them, a man in his late 30s, took my hand and said, “Welcome home, Your Highness.”

“Thank you.”

I followed the King and Queen inside the Palace; finding myself inside a large foyer with two large staircases on either side. While the King went off down a hallway, the Queen looked at me and said, “It might be a good idea for you to explore a little bit; get the lay of the land as it were.” Gesturing to an upstairs hallway, she said, “Your bedroom is down that hallway; take your first left then your second right and you’ll find it at the end of the hallway.”

“Thanks.” Thinking this place was turning into a maze, I said, “Where else might you suggest I check out?”

“I would suggest checking out to the Palace grounds; you’ll find a large garden and a stable with several dozen horses.” Smiling, she said, “Dinner will be served in about an hour in the dining room.”

“Thank you.”
1121211121111.title: Arriving at the Palace

11212111211111.content:
I'd seen Megan's room a few times (broad daylight and door wide open, geez, you pervs), so I figured I had a good idea what a teenage girl's bedroom looked like. However, walking into Catherine's... my bedroom taught me that was nothing like a princess's bedroom.

For one thing, there was what I later learned was called a sitting room, which was the first space I entered. This room contained several chairs, along with a bookcase, a table, and a desk. There was also a life-size portrait of the king and queen on one wall, and photographs of Catherine growing up on the opposite wall.

There were two doorways, not counting the one I came in through. One door led to the bathroom, where I saw that Catherine was one of those girls who keeps the sink counter covered with makeup. Oh, crap, I thought, I'm going to have to learn how to do this.

The bathroom had a second door, which led to the bedroom proper. This room was dominated by a canopy bed. Looking around, I didn't see a TV anywhere. Unless it was hidden, my guess was that the king and queen preferred to watch as a family.

Taking another look around, I did some mental measuring, and figured that my new bedroom took up more space than one floor of the house I grew up in. I could learn to like this, I thought, even love it.
11212111211111.title: Checking out the Bedroom

112121112111111.content:
After checking out the room a little more; including discovering a 60” TV hidden in the wall, I decided to head to the dining room for dinner. As I walked through the halls, I lost count of how many rooms I came across – I’d probably never get to see all of them before I left here.

I walked into the private dining room to find that the King and Queen were already sitting at the table. Having watched a lot of Disney, and classic, movies I was surprised to find the table was no bigger than my folk’s dining room table at home.
Seeing me, the Queen said, “Have a seat Catherine; dinner is about to be served.”

I quickly took a seat next to the Queen as a servant walked over to me. “What would you like to drink this evening, your highness?”

I had to give that a brief thought; before saying, “I’d like a glass of ginger ale, please.” Pausing, I said, “My stomach is still a little unsettled.”

“Of course, your highness; I’ll be back momentarily.”

Once the servant was gone, the King turned to me and said, “I trust you’re happy with your living arrangements?”

“Yes, your majesty.” Nodding, I said, “The bedroom is quite large; almost larger than one floor of my home in the US.”

“Catherine enjoyed her privacy; as I’m sure most teenagers do.” Looking at me, the King said, “If there’s anything you need while you’re here, just ask.”

I was surprised by the King’s sudden generosity; maybe the Queen had spoken with him. “Of course, your majesty; thank you for the offer.”

At that point, the servants came into the room carrying trays of food, as well as my ginger ale. Once the trays were on the table, they removed the covers – I saw a lovely seafood dish in front of me. I was so hungry that I immediately reached for the fork and started eating; only to be interrupted by the Queen clearing her throat. “Mind your manners, Catherine.”

Putting the fork down, I said, “Sorry your majesty.”

**********************************


The dinner was a quiet affair, nothing compared to the noise when my family would eat dinner – my dad was constantly talking about some legal case he was working on. Once the dinner was over, I excused myself in order to return to the bedroom.

Halfway up the stairs, I heard the Queen’s voice behind me. “Wait for me, Catherine.”

Stopping on the stairs, I turned to wait for her and said, “Can I help you?”

“I was going to see if you wanted some help; with learning to act like my daughter.”

“Actually, I was hoping you could help me with some makeup and hair techniques.”

“I’d be honored to.” As we continued up the stairs, she said, “Be just like when Catherine was growing up; we’d spend hours putting her hair into different styles.”
112121112111111.title: Dinner

1121211121111111.content:
"Now, do pay attention, Catherine," the Queen said. "The servants will wonder why I have to fix your face on a daily basis."

I nodded, and she began combing my hair.

As she worked, I asked, "Do you know what's happening with my friends? They've gotta be worried sick about me. Megan was looking for help for me when I disappeared."

"I'm afraid I can't answer your question, Catherine. But you may be able to find out tomorrow. Remember, they will be at the Bicentennial Gala."

Once she was happy with my hair, it was time to work on my face. The Queen told me what all the makeup bottles were and what they were for. Then, she put them to use, telling me everything she was doing.

After a long time, she said, "Have a look."

I looked.

My jaw dropped.

Then, I smiled. "I'm beautiful."
1121211121111111.title: Makeup & Hair with the Queen

1133.content:
Subject: Jon Que. Age: 14 Brief Description: 5' 10, collar length dust blond hair, wild hazel eyes.

Mission: Through secret DNA tests done on of all children applying for the student exchange program from the United States, this child is the closest match to the late, beloved princess Jessica. This child must be brought back to the monarchy immediately and prepped for transformation. If princess Jessica does not take the throne in two weeks time, the monarchy will die. You know the price for failure.

A large, dark man looked up from the paper and searched the crowd of passengers walking off the last plane to land in what was, in this dimension, United Europe. Soon, he spotted you and passively held up a sign with your first and last name on it as the other man was before he struck him.

The man who was supposed to take you to your foster family sat slumped in a chair behind the dark man, unconscious as you approached.

"Are you Jon Que from the United States?" he asked in a low but strong voice.

"That's me." you said. "May I assume you are the guy who will be taking me to see my foster family?"

The man smiled. It seemed forced to you, which gave you the impression he was not really a likable person. "Yes." he said. "This way, please."

You follow him, seeing the unconscious man, but figured he was suffering from jet lag and moved on. outside, the man brought you to a long, black limousine and opened the back door for you.

"Oh, I could get used to this!" you thought.

Only, as you entered, someone roughly grabbed your hand and yanked you inside.

"HEY!!"

That was all you managed to get out before a needle sank into your neck and you were swallowed by darkness.

What seemed like hours later, you woke up...

1141.content:
He dug his toes into the dirt behind home plate, squatting into position. Rusty raised his mitt, eyeing both his pitcher, the incredible Louis Lewis, and the opposing side's batter. He flashed the signals to the pitcher: one finger, three fingers, index and pinky (the horns), and four fingers. The first batter of the game, no outs, count is 0-0. Under their agreement, that meant the first sign: a nice, easy pitch down the middle.
Lewis wound up for the pitch, and Rusty observed the almost dance-like grace in the combining of so many actions into one fluid motion. Rusty used to be a pitcher himself, but didn't quite have as much of a knack at pitching than catching. He wouldn't have it any other way than with him behind the plate and Louis Lewis at the mound. As far as the both of them and Coach were concerned, they had found their indelible positions this season as starting pitcher and catcher for the school's C-team baseball. Together, the unstoppable duo, they had brought this team to the state championship after countless injuries and hours of practice. Now was a critical time for the team. Neither of them could fail.
As Lewis released, Rusty watched the trajectory of the ball soaring through the air. Louis Lewis had made perfect aim for the target Rusty gave him. Rusty opened his glove wide, watching the batter swing his heavy bat into motion jsut a fraction of a second too late.
"STEE-RIKE ONE!"
Half of the crowd cheered.
Rusty set up on the inside of the plate and signaled their code for another fastball. 'Bust him in,' Rusty thought at the climax of Lewis's windup. This time, the batter overanticipated. Rusty couldn't help but think about the precise timing and mathematical formulas and science that all went behind this stuff.
"STEE-RIKE TWO!"
More cheers.
Outside now, but still fastball...
Lewis shook Rusty off and planted a curveball on the back inside corner. But, just as the ball connected with Rusty's mitt...
