1512121.content:
"Where did you go?" Brandon asks as him and his brother were out playing in the woods.

"You gotta find me." Tyler, his brother shouts, who's voice is ringing out through the trees.

Sighing to himself, Brandon goes to find where his brother's voice was coming from. When he did finally catch up to his brother, they both noticed that there was what looked like some old castle out here. "How did this get here?" Brandon asks.

Tyler shakes his head. "I don't know but it gives me the creeps." he replies.

Brandon, however, lets his curiosity get the better of him. "I'm gonna go check it out." he says when he opens the door and goes inside.

"Wait I'm coming with you." Tyler says as he manages to slip right past the door before it closes on the both of them.

Brandon glances around and is stunned with what it is that he's seeing. "This is amazing, it looks like something out of a video game." he sputters to himself when he feels a strange tingle go through him that makes him shiver. The inside of the castle doesn't look dilapidated at all, instead like it's bright and full of life.

Once Tyler gets a glimpse of the place, he starts getting a bad feeling. "I think we should really leave Brandon, this isn't normal." he says.

Brandon takes a step forward when he feels like he's getting taller. "Tyler I think something's happening to me." he sputters as his age and height increase to 4'10" tall and fifteen years old. His legs get most of the height boost as they fill out and become curvier and thicker with wide, curvaceous thighs.
1512121.title: Princess Peach

choices: A stranger man with a strange offer.
153.content:
You sat there, in your diapers, with your arms folded and your eyes closed, sulking. Yesterday, you were an average high school student boy, looking forward to the up coming summer vacation. Now, thanks to a freak TG (Trans-Gender) Dust incident, you were suddenly regressed back in age to a toddler! The good news was that you still had your original mind with all of your memories and intelligence. The bad news was that you had lost all control over your bladder so diapers became a necessary evil of which your little, now big sister loved to torment you with by insisting on changing and caring for you in her own way.

As you thought back to the incident, you were not certain if it was fortunate, or unfortunate that you were the only victim. Unknown to you at the time, some man had stolen a vial of the pure stuff from some secret, government run research facility. Security teams were immediately sent out to capture him and the dangerous substance he had taken.

You were walking home from the last day of school for the summer when you saw what only could have been a car chase on the road. The car in the lead suddenly lost control and rammed into a tree. The driver, shaken, but unhurt, left the vehicle and ran with something in his hand.

"I wonder what's going on." you thought.

You watched as three men in the pursuit vehicle poured out and gave chase. As the lead man came near, you stepped aside, not wanting to be a part of it. But then, one of the pursuing men caught him by the legs and he fell, unintentionally throwing the vial that was in his hands.

The next few seconds played out in slow motion as you did not see the vial coming and it struck you in the head, releasing all of its contents onto you! You coughed as you breathed in some of the dust and the rest of it quickly burned through your clothing and became absorbed into your skin. That was when the changes occurred.

You were taken to the research facility by force, not that you could have given any resistance in your new tiny, toddler form. There, they ran a number of tests, again weather you liked it or not, then contacted your parents and informed them of the situation before returning you home.

"You were very fortunate." said one of the government doctors. "That TG dust could have transformed you into literally ANYTHING. You could have ended up as a girl, an animal, or worse."

As your mind returned to the present, you remembered being told that, because the TG dust was in its most pure form, the transformation was most likely permanent and you would have to grow up all over again.

"Those IDIOTS!" you thought. "If that dust was so dangerous why didn't they keep it in a safer place than some dinky little safe in an office!"

You threw your fist onto the floor with all of your infantile strength then began to shake with frustration until you felt a warm dampness against your skin. You had just peed into your diaper.

"AAAAAHHHHH!" you screamed. "NOT AGAIN!"

You then heard someone coming into the room. You looked up to find...
153.title: Male Toddler

1533.content:
The strange man was tall, pale, wearing a black business suit. He looked down at me and smiled as he knelled down in front of me. "Good afternoon, Cire Beatriz." he said in a polite tone. "My name is Munich, I represent the Cire royal family in the recently independent Soviet mountain nation of Teageistan."

You have never heard of this Soviet nation, nor did you know this Cire royal family or any royal family for that matter. You immediately placed yourself on guard, ready to scream for help should he try anything, not that there was anything else you could really do.

"What does the royal family of a Soviet nation want or care of a teen boy trapped inside a toddler body?" you asked, eying the man.

Munich sighed. "Teageistan is home to the most concentrated deposits of pure TG dust." he explained. "Our scientists are on the cutting edge of Trans Gender technology and are willing to return you to your rightful age."

Your ears perked up to that statement and you rose your eye brows in interest but you were fully aware that nothing, especially 'too good to be true' offers, came without a price.
"Exactly what does the Cire family want in exchange for this very generous offer?"

Munich frowned. "Our king has died, assassinated by a hard line general, named Rurik, wanting to maintain control of the TG dust." he said. "Our queen is a strong leader but she will not live forever, which is why we are grateful for the princess."

"What does this all have to do with me?" you asked.

"Our beloved Princess, Beatriz Cire, has mysteriously vanished without a trace." replied Munich. "So far, we have been able to keep this fact secret but time is against us as panic will ensue once word gets out, she is the last heir to the throne."

"In other words, without the princess, the queen will be the first and last ruler of your little monarch nation." you said with a sigh. "I'd rattle this Rurik's bones, he's the most likely suspect as he wants that TG dust your royal family controls."

"He's untouchable to a small nation such as ours." said Munich. "However, if we were to force his hand, trick him into confessing to the crime, we will have the world on our side."

"I still don't see how all of this involves me." you said. "what exactly do you want me to do to help find your missing princess?"

"Since you had absorbed pure TG dust, we can change you into any form we choose." said Munich, simply. "We need you to become princess Beatriz Cire and take her place to appease our people and lure General Rurik into the open."

To say you were shocked was an understatement. "What!?!" you asked. "You want me to masquerade as this princess and hope this general or whoever kidnapped the real princess takes the bait!? "

Munich nodded. "She is exactly your age and we will provide all the training you will need to carry out this deception flawlessly." he said. "You and your family will be compensated richly for your services and you will return to your proper age and form once the true princess is returned to us safely." he then smiled. "Its that or remain a diaper defendant toddler until you grow up."

You swallowed hard as Munich waited for your answer....
1533.title: A strange man with a stranger offer.

15332.content:
Even though you desperately wanted to return to your normal age, you were not so sure you wanted to stick your neck out for a family you had never met in a nation you have never heard of as a teenage royal princess. Plus, this Munich mentioned that you would be returned to normal when the true princess was returned safe and sound. What is she is not found alive or never found at all?

"I am sorry, Munich." you said, finally. "I do want to return to my rightful age but you are asking me to take a huge risk here." you sighed. "I respectfully decline your offer."

Munich sighed, bowing his head. "There is only one thing for me to do then." he said.

With that, he lunged at you, forcing a moist cloth against you nose and mouth. The fowl odor on the cloth immediately told you what is had been soaked with. "Shit!" you thought, struggling. "CHLOROFORM!"

Unfortunately, your tiny body was not strong enough to resist either Munich the chloroform and you were very quickly swallowed by darkness. The last thing you heard was Munich talking into a phone. "He resisted but I have him." he said. "I will arrive with 'her' by sunrise tomorrow, be ready."

Hours later, you wake up to find yourself...
15332.title: You refuse and are kidnapped.

153321.content:
You have no idea how much time passed since you were brutally knocked out in your own home. You remember that you were offered an odd chance of returning to normal, but only after you had to impersonate a princess. It sounded so crazy just thinking about it!

Slowly but surely, you were able to open your eyes, which felt quite heavy. 'That's the last time I ever trust a stranger' you thought as you woke up. However, as you looked up, you realized something.

You realized that you were in a bed. A very soft and luxurious one at that. You sat up in response and looked around. 'What the heck?' you thought as you looked around. In a word, this room was expensive indeed.

A large vanity sat in one corner next to a large pair of doors next to them. You guesses that they might be the entrance to the closet which surprised you. 'Is the closet really that big?' you thought.

Continuing on, there was a huge set of see-through doors that mostly led to a nice balcony. Everything else about the room looked shiny and regal in every sense of the word.

You've been thinking this whole time but you began to open your mouth and speak.
153321.title: In a luxurious bedroom.

1533211.content:
You had intended to ask yourself, 'Where am I?' but instead of your voice, a melodious, feminine voice with a strange accent softly rang from your mouth, "Vere am I?" you paused, fearful. "Vad happened to my voice?"

You threw the covers off yourself to discover that you were no longer a toddler but you were also no longer a boy or in your own home... you had been kidnapped, changed into a girl and taken to, you assumed, the tiny nation of Teageistan. Your first thought was to scream but you held back, deciding it best to instead know where you were and what you were up against. "I vill make him suffer for dis outrage!" you whispered, climbing out of bed. "I hath told him no and he forces dis onto me anyway!"

More curious than cautious, you slowly opened the two doors to reveal a very large walk in closet with an enormous wardrobe of girls' clothing. Looking upon yourself, you blushed upon seeing that you were wearing a light silk, nightshirt that allowed one to gaze upon the white panties and bra you were wearing. "I hath better change." you muttered, annoyed by your new voice and accent. "Ze last ting I need is for someone to see me like dis."

A sound of the bedroom door opening was heard, startling you, and saw three boys enter, laughing and playfully pushing each other around. You tried to grab something to cover yourself but you were not fast enough as the boys saw you and froze before you finally let out a scream that shook the room. The three boys pleaded with you in a strange language but, somehow, you understood them.

"Please, my lady, we meant no harm." said the first boy, gently taking your hand.

"They will punish us, please do not scream again." begged the second, taking your other hand into his. "We did not know you were in here."

The third boy gulped. "Too late." he said.

Seven guards, armed with guns, entered the room and immediately came to the wrong conclusion as they saw two boys holding your wrists while the other gawked at your lingerie clad body. "Infidels!" screamed a large man in strange armor. "Seize them!"

The other six men made short work of capturing the three boys before forcing them to knell and remain still before you as the man then turned to you. "My princess, I hand my head in shame, allowing these three criminal boys to invade your privacy and attack you." he said with a guilty look. "I shall personally punish them by transforming them into pieces of your new outfit for the day, then washed and added to your collection until you see fit to release them."

The three boys began to sob but the guards forced them into silence as the man then asked you for your decision.

What do you say?
1533211.title: Strange words come out

You notice something about a bonus to the first late-night tour customer about winning the chance to live like a princess, you figure that it would be better if it said 'prince or princess', but hey, apparently no one else has done it yet or else the sign would be down.

You decide to...
155111111.title: Visit the castle

choices: Jake runs up wanting a ticket.
The window closes and the tour starts.
1551111111.content:
You walk over to the booth, and find a very bored looking ticket-person, but as he sees you approaching he perks up a bit.

"Are you here for the late-night tour?" He asked you.

"Yeah, I guess so." You reply.

"Well, congratulations, you're customer number one! You get to take the tour for free, and the rest of your prize will be awarded once we're inside, and since noone else seems to be coming to take the tour, I suppose we should start right away!" You feel slightly excited and wonder what you'll get as a prize. You're secretly hoping for some money, because you're starting to run low on funds at the college.

The ticket man begins to close the window and puts on a tour guide hat when...
1551111111.title: Try to be customer number one

15511111111.content:
"Wait!" you turn around to see Jake running up to the window.

The guide lets the window slide back up, "Are you here for the late-night tour?" He asks.

"Yeah... I can't... let him... take the... tour all... by himself." Jake gets out between gasps for breath.

The guide turns to you, "Sir, is this person with you?"

You turn toward Jake and say...
15511111111.title: Jake runs up wanting a ticket.

155111111111.content:
"Yeah, I know him."

"Well then, congratulations! You're our number TWO customer, but I guess since you are with the number one customer you can get in for free and have a prize too!" The guide then closes the window. "And now if you two gentlemen would just come this way with me."

You and Jake follow the man toward a side entrance. "I'm sorry we won't be visiting the main entrance, but it's getting cleaned right now."

The man pulls out some keys and unlocks the door, "Step in my fine sirs."

You and Jake step through the door, and...
155111111111.title: Yes

choices: The King and Queen of Manonia
1551111111111.content:
You step through the door and find that there is nothing below your foot. You fall down about 10 feet into a pile of hay and soon Jake lands beside you.

"Congratulations again my fine sirs, I'm sure you'll come to love your prizes." The guide disappears and you hear the door above close, creating complete darkness.

"Well this is cool," You hear Jake say beside you. "Kidnapped by a royal family."

You hear footsteps in the distance and a door opens, nearly blinding you with the light, as your eyes focus you can see two silhouettes. "Welcome, guests, to the Royal Palace. Please, please, forgive our rude welcome, and follow us, we assure you that there will be no more trapdoors."

Seeing no other choice you and Jake follow the two figures down a hallway, as you step into the hallway you see that the pair is very finely dressed.

"We are Markus and Sophie, and we are...
1551111111111.title: Fall into a trapdoor

15511111111111.content:
...we are the King and Queen of Manonia. I hope you do forgive us. We just needed you to meet us in a more private setting than the front of the castle. Although we weren't expecting two of you." The King finished.

"Yes, but I suppose we should tell you why we want you here." The Queen started. "We need you to be our heir, or rather heirs. While, Markus and I would love to have an heir of our own, sadly we cannot have children. Although, there has been a rumor that we have a child, but we've been keeping her out of the country to avoid spoiling her and making her unfit to lead. While the rumor is that there is only one child, I'm sure the circulation of the rumor that the royal twins are coming home would make everyone forget that detail of the original rumor."

To you it seemed like quite the story, and you weren't even sure yet that these were even the real King and Queen.

Jake seemed convinced though, "So you're saying we get to live here, and even be kings? Sign me up!"

The King and Queen smile, "You'll even get access to the royal treasure, altough we must ask that you don't spend it all."

The Queen turns to you, "Would you like to take us up on your offer? If not, we'll give you a personal tour and send you on your way."

The offer is very tempting, provided these are the real King and Queen. You think for a moment and say...
15511111111111.title: The King and Queen of Manonia

choices: go to your rooms to get some sleep.
155111111111111.content:
"Sure," you say.

The King and Queen smile even bigger, "Wonderful," the King says, "let us give you a tour of your new home."

You spend the next two hours following around the King and Queen, as they show you the various rooms around the castle, all the while saying how much you'll love it.

"Well that's the tour," the King finishes, "we'll let you get back to your hotel. You're with the college group that is visiting tomorrow if I'm not mistaken, we hope to see you then."

You and Jake arrive back at the hotel and...
155111111111111.title: "Sure"

choices: The King and Queen waiting for your group
1551111111111111.content:
You both pass out as soon as you reach your bedrooms, you have dreams about what you'll do as king, starting from the realistic to the just plain fantastical. You're about to save your kingdom from a dragon when a violent shaking wakes you up.

"Hey, get up or you'll miss the tour." Jake says, "Murdoc's been banging on the door for the past 20 minutes."

You grab some clothes out of your drawer and put them on faster than you've ever put them on before, and soon you and your class is on the way to the castle.

You see a tour guide in the same booth that you won your prize at yesterday, but it isn't the same guy. Your professor walks up and gets the tickets and hands them out to you as you follow the new tour guide up the steps and into the castle.

This tour guide is boring compared to the royal company you had last night, but as you come to the stairs you see...
1551111111111111.title: go to your rooms to get some sleep.

15511111111111111.content:
The King and Queen are standing on the steps of the palace, just as the tour is about to end.

"I hope you had an enjoyable time at the castle." The Queen says.

Professor Murdoc seems completely speechless, it was obvious he hadn't been expecting to see the King and Queen. "Yes, yes we did," he finally manages to blurt out.

The Queen then looks over your class, "It's always so nice to see the next generation of leaders enter our halls, hopefully tomorrow will be a great place." You and Jake exchange glances, knowing that she's specifically talking to you, you can tell she is trying to tell you come back tomorrow.

The King and Queen allow your tour group to ask questions. Your classmates ask all sorts of things. After a while Prof. Murdoc says it's time to go and thanks the King and Queen for talking to them. Your group then heads back to the hotel. You and Jake are ready for tomorrow and hopefully your new place as royalty of Manonia.

You and Jake...
15511111111111111.title: The King and Queen waiting for your group

155111111111111111.content:
You wake up at the first sign of light coming through your window. You find Jake is up as well, you both get dressed and head over to the palace.

At the tour booth, the tour guide from your first night is there. "Well there are our winners!" He exclaims, "They're expecting you through the side door."

You and Jake eagerly go to the side door and step through. The trapdoor doesn't open on you this time and you walk down the hall to what seems like a small conference room.

The King and Queen are sitting in two large chairs across from the door as you enter. The King motions toward the door, and you shut it.

"I suppose you two are wondering how we can get you away from your class so you can stay here as our heirs, and it is a somewhat complex plan. It involves...
155111111111111111.title: Tomorrow

choices: The plan goes without a hitch
1551111111111111111.content:
"We need you to just be walking down the street, when a black van will pull up beside you and pull you in. After a short chase, in which the van will lose our police, you will be dropped off behind the castle, we'll let you stay in one of the non-tour rooms while we prepare to make you our heirs."

The plans sounds good enough to you and Jake, so you both agree.
1551111111111111111.title: a fake kidnapping.

15511111111111111111.content:
As planned you and Jake are walking down on the opposite end of the city when the van pulls up and you are yanked inside. You hear police sirens behind you, but they soon disappear. You find out the fake kidnapping crew are actually going to be your servants as the heirs. You're soon let out behind the castle, and just as quickly find yourself in a spacious room that you hadn't seen yet. After about a ten minute wait the King and Queen enter the room.

"The news of your kidnapping is spreading, your American news channell CNN has already begun a report on it. Unfortunately, you'll be one of those unsolved cases." The Queen smiled. "We're going to offer a formal apology and announce the arrival of our heirs at the same time."

The Queen presses a button on the wall and a large TV reveals itself from the wall. "You can watch the speech from here," she says.

Then they leave, and about thirty minutes later the TV announces an offical announcement from the King and Queen from Manonia.

The Queen's face appears on the screen. "We would like to apologize for the kidnapping of the the two American students inside our borders. It falls during a time that we were just getting ready to celebrate the return of our heirs...
15511111111111111111.title: The plan goes without a hitch

choices: Just put on the royal dresses and everything else will fall into place.
155111111111111111111.content:
You and Jake look at the screen in near-disbelief. Did it just say princess? About the instant that the news announcement ended the King and Queen re-enter the room. "Well, now that that is taken care of are you ready to become our heirs?"

"Why did you say princesses on the TV?" Jake demands.

"Oh, well Manonia is a matriarchal monarchy, so only Princesses can inherit the throne. Anyway, we need you to be on a plane so that you don't just suddenly appear in the castle, you'll become our heiresses on the plane."

Before you or Jake could protest a swarm of maids and servants drag you into a limo and off to a private airport. You are soon aboard a large plane that seems to be the equivalent of Air Force 1. You find that there is a large bedroom on the plane, and both you and Jake are put into it.

After what seems like hours, a maid enters the room.

"How exactly are we supposed to become Princesses?" Jake asks, and none too politely.

The maid looks somewhat rattled by Jake's discontent, but quickly regains her composure and says, "...
155111111111111111111.title: Princess Josefine and Princess Jacie

1551111111111111111111.content:
"All you have to do is put on the royal dresses." she says as she walks over to a closet and opens it, revealing a small pink dress and an equally small sky blue dress. "And the King and Queen wanted you to know that the plane can't land until the Princesses are on board, and that there are tanker planes that can refuel us during flight"

Jake groans and falls back on the bed. "These people are crazy, I'll put on the stupid dress just to prove it doesn't fit and that you're all insane."

Jake walks over and grabs a dress and goes into the changing room. "You can have the other one." he says through the door.

You look back to the closet and see the __________ dress hanging from it's hanger.
1551111111111111111111.title: Just put on the royal dresses and everything el...

choices: You put on the rest of the dress
15511111111111111111111.content:
'It figures he would leave me the pink one' you think. You take it off the hanger and go over to the other changing room.

You find the changing room is full of mirrors, you can see almost every angle of your body. "Jake's right, these people are crazy," you mutter to yourself.

You take off your clothes and find that there are panties included with the dress. "I suppose I have to wear those too." You think.

You are soon stading naked in the changing room. You slide the panties up your legs, you aren't an expert but you can tell these are an extremely expensive pair of panties. Soon the panties are in place, and...
15511111111111111111111.title: Pink

choices: Put on the rest of the dress
Run back out into the bedroom.
155111111111111111111111.content:
You feel a tingle running through you lower body, but you discount it as the panties cutting off the blood supply to your legs.

You suddenly hear a scream from the room. You wonder what it is, when you notice that your lower legs are now hairless and are now slimmer, while your feet are much smaller than they used to be. You stare in amazement as the hair continues to disappear up your leg. Soon the tingle has reached your groin, you look down to see the bulge in your pants start to flatten out. "OH CRAP!" you think and try to pull the panties off, but all that does is give you a view as your lifelong manhood disappears right before your eyes. You feel your hips expand, but it appears the changes aren't going any higher.
155111111111111111111111.title: You start to change

1551111111111111111111111.content:
When you put on the rest of the dress, the tingle starts moving up the rest of your body and you notice that your body is becoming more feminine. Your hips flare out to an attractive size while your butt expands to match it. On your chest, a pair of C-cup breasts form under the dress.

Then when your body stops changing you look down and see that your whole body perfectly fits the dress and its not tight anymore. "What will happen if I put on the tiara?" you ask yourself. You put on the tiara and start to feel a tingle in your head now. What happens next?
1551111111111111111111111.title: Put on the rest of the dress

15511111111111111111111111.content:
After putting the tiara on your head, your entire head starts to tingle. Turning to face the one of the mirrors you watch, in amazement as your face becomes more feminine and your brown hair grows down to your shoulders. Your eyebrows thin and eyelashes extend while your nose becomes small and cute. Your lips become fuller and your eyes round, completing your face.

As you look at your reflection, you it hard to believe that you were ever a boy. Thinking to yourself, you say, "I could get used to this."

Just then there was a knock on the door, followed by the maid saying, "Lady Josefine, are you finished?"

Turning to the doorway, you say, "Yes, I am finished."

As you wait for the maid to open the door, you marvel at how nice your voice sounds. The door opens, a second later, and the maid walks into the room. Seeing you, she says, "You look lovely, m'lady."

Smiling, you say, "Thank you."

Stepping aside, the maid says, "Your sister, Lady Jacie is waiting for you in the bedroom."

"Thank you," trying to talk like royalty, you say, "Please tell her I will be out shortly."

"Right away, m'lady."

After the maid left, you turn to face the mirror again, "Goodbye Joey Warner," smiling, you say, "Hello Josefine, Princess of Manonia."

With that, you walk back into the bedroom.
15511111111111111111111111.title: Your transformation is complete!

155111111111111111111111111.content:
You walk into the bedroom a minute later; and see your twin sister, Jacie, sitting on the bed. As you walk into the room, she looks at you and says, "Joey!?"

"Yeah," smiling, you say, "Believe it or not, its me."

Getting up, she walks over to hug you. "I can't believe this actually worked!"

"I know. Just yesterday we were Joey Warner and Jake Turner," smiling, you say, "Now we're Josefine and Jacie; twin sisters and princesses."

As the two of you talk, the maid walks back into the room. "Sorry for interrupting, m'ladys, but the plane is landing shortely and your parents, the King and Queen, are anxious to see you."

Jacie, looking at the maid, says, "Thank you."

After the maid leaves, you turn to Jacie and say, "How old do you think we are now?"

"I don't know. I'm guessing," pausing, she says, "We're about 16 or 17."

"Wow! We're royalty, and we're 5 years younger."


The plan landed a few minutes later. As Jacie and you were escorted from the bedroom, you say to Jacie, "Are you ready to be introduced to our people?"

"Yes."

The two of you arrive at the gangway and a crewmember opens the door. Both of you, taking a deep breath, step out of the airplane to thunderous applause and bright lights
155111111111111111111111111.title: In the bedroom

1551111111111111111111111111.content:
As Jacie and you, carefully, walk down the stairs you look at the crowd, 40 or so people, that had lined up around the plane. As you got to the bottom of the stairs you turn to Jacie, "This is really impressive."

Smiling, Jacie leans in and whispers to you, "We're princesses now, so we should get used to this sort of treatment."

Taking the hint, you smile and start waving to the crowd. As you're waving, to your surprise, you spot Professor Murdoc and your, former, classmates. Pointing them out to Jacie, you say, "Wonder why they're here?"

Getting into her role, Jacie says, "Mother and Father must've invited them as a way to say sorry for our 'kidnapping.'"

Speaking of mother and father, you spot them walking towards you. Smiling, Jacie and you walk over to them. As the four of you are 'reunited,' father says, "You two look beautiful."

Smiling, you say, "Thank you father."

After that, the four of you head over to a podium where Jacie and you are introduced to your country. After the applause died down, both Jacie and you spoke about how good it was to be home.

After taking some photos, the four of you were escorted to a waiting limo and taken to the palace. On your way to the palace, you say, "Father, why were our old classmates, and our professor, in the audience?"

"We thought letting them have front-row seats to your 'return,' would make them feel better about your 'kidnapping.'"

Looking at Jacie, then back to your father, you say, "Would it be alright if Jacie and I met with them?"

Looking at your mother, then back to you, your father says, "That would be okay. But, if you don't mind my asking, why would you want to see them?"

"We would like to express our sorrow about the loss of their friends. Also, it would be a good way for us to say goodbye to our old lives."

"That's understandable," smiling, your father says, "I'll have it arrainged."

"Thank you father."
1551111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

15511111111111111111111111111.content:
As the limo drove to the palace, you look away from the window to your father. "Father, I have a question?"

"Yes Josefine?"

"Seeing as Jacie and I were boys," pausing, you say, "How are we going to know how to act like girls?"

"The magic used to transform you will, over the next several days, change your personality to that of a girls," pausing, he says, "By this time next week it would be as if the two of you had been girls your entire lives."

Satisfied, you say, "Thank you for explaning."


The limo pulled up, in front of the palace, a few minutes later. After your father, and mother, exited the limo it was your turn. As you turned to step out of the limo a hand appears in front of you, followed by a man saying, "Let me help you, m'lady?"

Looking up, in the direction of the voice, you recognize one of your 'kidnappers.' Taking his hand, you say, "Thank you..."

Taking the hint, the man introduces himself, "I'm Sacha, m'lady."

Smiling, you get out of the car and say, "Thank you Sacha."

Moments later, after Jacie had exited the limo, you follow your parents into the palace. Once inside father turns to you and says, "You two must be hungry after your ordeal?"

Jacie, behind you, says, "Yes father, we're famished."

Smiling, father says, "Dinner will be served in an hour," gesturing to two women, walking towards you, he says, "Allow Alina and Veronika to escort to your chambers."

Jacie and your curtsey as your parents turn to leave, then turn to Alina and Veronika. Looking at them, you say, "You have been made aware our past identities?"

Alina, nodding, says, "Yes, Lady Josefine, we have. You mustn't worry about your pasts being revealed; everyone in the palace as signed a strict non-disclosure form."

"Thank you."
15511111111111111111111111111.title: Back at the palace

155111111111111111111111111111.content:
Alina and Veronika lead you, down many hallways, to your chambers. Arriving outside two closed doors, Alina turns and says to you, "Here are your chambers, m'ladys. May we show you around?"

Jacie, nodding, says, "Yes please."

Smiling, Alina opens the doors. After Alina stepped to the side, Jacie and you walked into your chambers. Both of your jaws drop as you look around your new room; the room was slightly bigger than your old house. You spot two king sized canopy beds on one side of the room, with a walk-in closet and bathroom for each of you. In one corner of the room, you spot a sitting area with a couch, recliners, and a big screen TV. In another corner, you spotted a desk with 2 top of line laptops, one for each of you, sitting on the desk.

Turning around, you look at Alina and Veronika. "Thank you for showing us to our chambers," pausing, you say, "We'd like to be alone, until dinner, if you don't mind."

Alina, bowing, says, "As you wish, m'lady."

After the door closes, you look at Jacie with a smile, "Can you believe this all ours!?"

Sitting down on her bed, Jacie says, "I know!!"

As Jacie sat on her bed, you walked over to the, almost floor to ceiling, window. While you looked out the window, at the gardens, Jacie wandered into her closet. After a few seconds, she says, "Josefine!!"

Spinning around, you go to Jacie's closet, "What?"

Showing you an expensive dress, Jacie says, "Our closets are filled with designer clothes."

"Makes sense," looking at the other outfits, you say, "Mother and father want only the best for us."

After that two of you look around the room, somemore, until Alina and Veronika came to bring you to dinner. On the way to the main dining room, you find out that Alina is going to be your personal servant, while Veronika would be Jacie's.
155111111111111111111111111111.title: In your chambers

1551111111111111111111111111111.content:
Alina and Veronika escort the two of you to the dining hall. Walking inside, you're amazed by how nice it looks, the walls were solid oak and it was about the size of your new bedroom. The table was 8 ft long x 3 ft wide, and was also made of oak.

Looking around somemore, you say, "I could definetly see myself getting used to this."

At that point, Alina says, "M'lady, would you like to take your seat?"

Turning to face Alina, you say, "Yes, I would, thank you."

You follow Alina over to a empty across from Jacie and, with the help of Alina, you take your seat. After Alina pushes your seat in, and gives you a napkin, you say, "Thank you Alina. You and Veronika may rest now."

Bowing Alina, and Veronika, says, "Thank you m'lady."

Alina and Veronika left the room just as your parents came into the room. After they were seated, father said to you, "I hope your room is to your liking?"

"It is," exchanging a glance with Jacie, you say, "Thank you father."

"No thanks are necessary, my dear daughter. Your mother and I wanted to spare no expense for our daughters."

After that kitchen workers came out to serve dinner; a delicious pork roast. As everyone ate, Jacie turned to father and says, "Father, did you make the arrangements that Josefine and I requested?"

"Yes, I have. Your, former, professor and classmates will be escorted into the conference room, where you were brought after the 'kidnapping,' where you will have a chance to say what you need to."

"Thank you father."

Desert was served a short time later, an assortment of pies.

20 minutes later, after everyone was full, father stood up and said, "Before we all turn in, I just want to say how nice it is to have two beautiful daughters," smiling, he says, "You two will love your life as princesses."

Standing up Jacie, and you, curtsey and say, "Thank you, father, for giving us this opportunity."

After that your parents got up and were escorted to their chamber. After they left, Alina and Veronika walked over to the table, "Shall we get you ready for bed, m'ladys?"

"Yes we shall."


30 minutes later, after getting changed into night gowns, Jacie and you get into bed. After closing the curtain, and picking up your dresses to be cleaned, Alina and Veronika leave the room. As they close the door, Alina says, "Pleasent dreams, m'ladys. Welcome home."

After the door closed you turn to face Jacie, in her bed, and say, "This all seems like a dream, doesn't it Jacie?"

Looking at you, Jacie says, "I know. When we found out what was going to happen to us, I was worried that we'd made a mistake accepting father's offer. But now, I'm glad we did."

"Me too," pausing, you say, "Tomorrow we say goodbye to our old lives, and then we can truly begin our new lives as Jacie and Josefine; Princesses of Manovia."

After that, the two of you fall asleep.
1551111111111111111111111111111.title: In the dining room (Dinner)

15511111111111111111111111111111.content:
You are woken up, around 8:30 the next morning, by the sound of a curtain being opened. Opening your eyes you're momentarilly confused by your surroundings; you were about to ask where you were before remembering the events of yesterday.

As your eyes got reaccustomed to the light, you hear Alina say, "Morning m'lady."

Sitting up, you say, "Good morning Alina."

Smiling, Alina says, "The King has arrainged for your former classmates to arrive at 9:30. We must get you, and Lady Jacie, dressed."

"Okay," getting out of bed, with Alina's help, you say, "Where do we begin?"

"Follow me to the bathroom."

Walking into the bathroom, behind Alina, you say, "Alina, may I ask a question?"

Closing the door Alina, looking at you, Alina says, "M'lady, you don't need to ask."

Smiling, you say, "Are you okay with who I used to be?"

Looking at you, Alina hesitates before saying, "It would be inappropriate for me to answer that question, m'lady."

"I give you permission."

"Veronika and I do not care who you, and Lady Jacie, were before yesterday," pausing, Alina says, "As far as we're concerned you are, and always have been, princesses."

"Thank you for your honesty."

After that, with Alina's help, you got undressed and stepped into the shower. Once in the shower, as you expected Jacie was doing, you decided to examine your new body. Starting at your chest, and working down, you discovered how sensative your new breasts were. You also discovered how soft your skin had become; as well as how sensative your new equipment was; not realizing that you were moaning the entire time.

Satisfied about your body, you decide to start taking a shower. Stepping out 10 minutes later, you receive a towel from Alina. As you dried yourself off, you noticed Alina giggling as she took your bathrobe off the hook. "May I ask what is so amusing, Alina?"

"Forgive my candor m'lady. But," Alina stopped giggling and looked at you, "I trust your new body was to your satisfaction?"

Realizing that you'd been heard, you say, "You heard that?"

"Yes m'lady," looking at you, she says, "I will not tell the King and Queen."

"Thank you. To answer your question," smiling, you say, "Yes it does."

A few minutes later, after you were suffieciently dried, Alina led you back into the room; as Veronika was helping Jacie get dressed. Leading you into the closet, Alina says, "What does m'lady feel like wearing today?"

Looking around, you spot a casual dress hanging in the middle of the closet (http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_jvl5PDJv7QU/Re...). Pointing to it, you say, "I feel like wearing that today."

Looking at the dress, Alina smiles and says, "Looks like the magic has started to rework your mind, m'lady. That was the dress I was going to suggest."


With Alina's, and Veronika's help, both Jacie and you were dressed in about 20 minutes. Jacie had chosen a similar dress, except in blue, and was wearing a nice pair of heels. Looking at her walking around, you say, "My dear Jacie. If I didn't know better, I'd say this wasn't your first time in heels."

Looking at you, with a smile, she says, "I'll pretend you didn't say that."

After that Alina, and Veronika, worked on your hair and make-up. So that father and mother would be able to tell you apart Alina kept your hair down, while Veronika put Jacie's hair up. Alina, smiling, says, "You look lovely today."

Grinning, you say, "Thank you Alina."

Jacie, standing next to you, says, "May you take us to see our classmates now?"

"Right away m'lady."
15511111111111111111111111111111.title: The next morning

155111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As you follow Alina and Veronika to the conference room you turn to Jacie. "It just dawned on me that this may, very well, be the last time we ever see our classmates again."

Jacie stops walking and looks at you, "You sound upset by that."

"No, I'm not upset by it. We had great lives as Joey and Jake, but," looking at Jacie, you say, "I can say, with great certainty, that I'm happier as Josefine."

Smiling, Jacie says, "Same here."

Just then, Alina walks up to you, "M'ladys, we're keeping your guests waiting."

"Sorry Alina."

With that, Jacie and you continue down the hallway towards the conference room. As you get closer to the conference room, you spot a doorman standing outside of the room. The doorman, seeing you, nods in your direction then steps into the room.

As you stop outside the room, you hear the doorman say, "Ladies and Gentlemen, allow me to introduce you to Josefine and Jacie; Princesses of Manovia."

After the introduction, Jacie and you walk into the room.
155111111111111111111111111111111.title: Going to the conference room

1551111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Walking into the room you see Professor Murdoc, and your classmates, sitting in chairs along the conference table. Everyone stands up, as the two of you walk over to the table, and walk over to you.

"Lady Josefine, Lady Jacie, it is an honor to meet you," Professor Murdoc, reaching his hand out, says, "My students and I would like to welcome you back to your home."

Smiling, you take Professor Murdoc's hand and say, "Thank you for your kind words."

After Professor Murdoc shook her hand, everyone takes a seat. Once she was seated, Jacie says, "I bet you're wondering why we asked to meet with you?"

Looking at you, Professor Murdoc says, "Yes, we are. It's not every day that a tour group is invited to meet with the Royal Daughters."

Exchanging a glance with Jacie, you say, "Our father informed us of what happened to your students; Joey Warner and Jake Thompson."

Hearing the names of their lost friends, your classmates get a sad look on their faces. Seeing this, Jacie says, "We know that it won't bring your friends back, but we wanted to express our sorrow over their loss."

One of your classmates, Kelly Jameson, looks at you and says, "H...have you heard anything more?"

Remembering what father had said, during dinner, you say, "Father told us that police have found the vehicle in the kidnapping; as well as bags, and clothes, belonging to Mr. Warner and Mr. Thompson."

Hearing this, Kelly bursts into tears. "I miss them so much. I...I never told Joey how I felt about him."

Shocked, that Kelly had feelings for you, you say, "Were you close?"

"We...we knew eachother since preschool. He was my bestfriend and I had a crush on him since high school."

Hearing that, you start to tear up. Seeing this, Jacie turns to the group and says, "How would you all feel about a picture?"

The mention of a picture made everyone cheer up. Moments later, with Jacie and you sitting in front of your classmates, a Palace staff member named Mickiel took your picture. Once that was done, Mickiel says to Professor Murdoc, "You shall each recieve signed copies of this photo before you go to the airport tomorrow."

After that Professor Murdoc and your classmates say goodbye. Moments later, as you were alone in the room, Jacie turns to you says, "Are you okay?"

Looking at Jacie, you say, "My bestfriend had a crush on me, Jacie."

"I know," taking your hand in hers, Jacie says, "But that life is behind us now."

Wiping the tears from your eyes, you say, "Yes it is. We should do something to enjoy it."

Looking at you, Jacie says, "While I was getting dressed, Veronika told me that we each have our own horses in the stable. How do you feel about some horseback riding?"

"That sounds fun."
1551111111111111111111111111111111.title: Saying goodbye

choices: Two fancy ball gowns (for a 'Welcome Home' ball tomorrow)
15511111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Once you were back in your bedroom. Jacie and you tell Alina, and Veronika, what you planned to do today. Alina, hearing that, says, "Excellent choice m'ladys; it would be a sin to spend this lovely day in the palace."

"I assume Jacie and I have riding outfits?"

"Yes m'lady. If you'll please follow me," heading towards the closet, Alina says, "I'll help you get into it."

Following Alina into the closet, you say, "Alina, how long have you been at the palace?"

"M'lady, I've been here for two years. My father, a businessman, is friends with your father."

"If I may ask, how old are you?"

Placing the outfit on a table, Alina walked over and started to help you out of the dress. As she did that, with a smile, Alina says, "I will be 18 in two months, m'lady."

Pleased to hear Alina was your age, you say, "Would it be alright if you and I were friends? You've been very helpful, to me, and I want to repay your kindness with my friendship."

Blushing, Alina says, "I would be honored, to be your friend, Lady Josefine."

You were down to your bra, and panties, at that point. As Alina helped you into the pants, you say, "Then, in that case, I invite you to come riding with Lady Jacie and myself this morning."

"Thank you m'lady; its an honor."


You walk out of the closet 10 minutes later, as Jacie walked out of hers. Looking at you, in the riding outfit, Jacie says, "I never imagined myself saying this, but these are lovely outfits."

Looking in the mirror, just outside the closet, you admire your reflection (http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_HyCE2LK4JLA/Sa...). Looking back at Jacie, you say, "I agree, dear sister."

Just then, as you were walking over to Jacie, the bedroom door opened; followed by father walking into the room. Seeing you in your outfits, he says, "You look lovely girls."

"Thank you father," smiling, you say, "What, may I ask, brings you to our room?"

Smiling, father says, "I come bearing gifts for my two lovely daughters."

Hearing the word 'gifts' Jacie says, "What kind of gifts, father?"
15511111111111111111111111111111111.title: Horseback riding

155111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As if on cue two servants, who you'd never seen before, came walking into your room. Each of them was carrying a beautiful ball gown (http://stylesuccess.files.wordpress.com/...).

Until yesterday you never imagined getting a dress would get you excited. Looking at the dresses, you say, "Father, they're beautiful."

Smiling, Father says, "Only the best for my daughters."

Taking her dress, Jacie says, "What, may I ask, is the occassion?"

"There will be a 'Welcome Home' ball tomorrow to commerate your return home," pausing he says, "The richest families in Manovia will be in attendence, to welcome you home."

Taking your dress, and looking at it, you say, "Will there be dancing?"

"Yes, there will be dancing. As the King, it is customary for me to have a dance with my daughters at each ball; plus you are free to dance with any suitor who asks."

You were surrpised to see that you were okay with the idea of dancing with a boy. Looking at father, you say, "Thank you for the dresses Father. We look forward to wearing them tomorrow evening."

"Yes," Jacie, smiling, says, "Thank you father."

"You're welcome girls. By the way," pausing, Father says, "Please come to the front steps, at 4:00, for the second part of your gift."

With that, Father left. A few minutes later Alina and Veronika came back wearing their riding gear. "Shall we go, m'ladys?"
155111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Two fancy ball gowns (for a 'Welcome Home...

1551111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
A little while later, out on the grounds, you were horseback riding with Alina, Veronika and Jacie. While Alina and Veronika were having a little race, you rode up to where Jacie was with her horse.

Looking at you, Jacie says, "Look's like you've got something to say?"

Stopping, you say, "With all that's happened to us, these past few days, have you notice how quickly we've adapted to being girls?"

Pausing, to think, Jacie says, "Yeah I have noticed that. I'm actually surprised how calm we've both been; its not everyday you change from two college students into 17-year-old princesses."

"It must be the magic that was used to change us; its making us calm about the change."

"Yeah," pausing, Jacie says, "We should ask Father, and Mother."

Just then, Alina rode up to you, "M'ladys; its almost lunch time, shall we go inside and eat?"

"Yes, I'm famished, that's a good idea."
1551111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Horseback Riding

15511111111111111111111111111111111112.content:
You and Jacie had both gone to your rooms with Alina and Veronika. They helped you out of the riding gear and into something more suited for the rest of you day. You each choose a dress and sweater(http://images2.chictopia.com/photos/Blus...). and were on your way to get some lunch. You were walking past the foyer when you noticed that your classmates were leaving. You also noticed that Kelly and her friend stayed behind a little bit. You decided to walk over to them.

"Excuse me miss, are you alright?" you ask Kelly.

"Yea I'm fine now, but I sure hope Joey turns up soon. I thought something was suspicious when they went on that midnight tour. Maybe that has something to do with it. I miss him so." she said with a tear in her eye.

"Come on kelly they were annoying now lets go!" her friend Allison said. "I'm sorry m'lady, but we need to go."

"Oh where are you going next?" you asked them.

"We are going to another small country called Bollinia." Kelly said. You quickly wrote something on a piece of paper, and handed it to her.

"Hopefully this information will comfort you. I wish you luck on your travels." you said as you waved goodbye. You quickly ran up to your sister and continued to walk to lunch.
15511111111111111111111111111111111112.title: In the foyer

155111111111111111111111111111111111121.content:
As you were being prepared for bed, you had the TV on and were listening to the news. Nothing unusual had happened. But by some strange coincidence, Bollinia had it's twin princes arrive home today. It showed a picture of them on the TV.

"Well that's odd isn't it Josefine." Jacie said to you.

"Sure is sister," you replied.

"I heard that they were invited to the ball tomorrow." Aline said as she finished dressing you in a nightie. You turned off the TV and head to bed. The next day....
155111111111111111111111111111111111121.title: Later that day

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
The next morning, around 9:00, you were sitting at the desk using your computer; while Jacie was reading a book on the couch. You had a few hours until the two of you were to get ready for the ball and father said you could do what you wanted.

Going to the website for the your original hometown newspaper, you say, "Jacie, I wonder if there is any mention of our 'kidnapping' in the paper?"

Looking at you, Jacie says, "Why wouldn't there be? Its a small town; everybody's probably upset."

By that point the site had loaded. Looking at it, sure enough, the headline says 'Local Students Missing from Trip.' Opening the link, you say, "There's an article here about us."

Getting up, Jacie walks over and says, "What's it say?"

Looking at the screen, you read aloud, "Two local students from the University of Virginia were reportedly kidnapped while on a field trip to Bollinia..."

Hearing that, Jacie says, "Bollinia!? What's going on? We were 'kidnapped' in Manonia."

"I don't know," looking back at the screen, you continue reading, "Kelly Jamison and Allison Cartwright were kidnapped while on a trip to Bollinia. This kidnapping comes just days after two other students, Joey Warner and Jake Thompson, were kidnapped while on a trip to, neighboring, Manonia."

Looking at you, Jacie says, "What's going on here? Kelly and Allison get kidnapped the same day that the royal twins of Bollinia return home. This sounds a lot like what happened to us."

You were about to respond when, to your surprise, a male voice says, "It's exactly what happened to you two, Jake."

Jacie and you turn to see two boys, who you recognize as the the Princes, standing in your doorway. Shocked, you say, "How dare you enter our chamber without permission."

The 2nd boy says, "Calm down Joey; don't get your skirt in a knot."

Getting confused, you say, "W-who are you?"

The first boy, smiling, says, "Its us Jake. Kelly and Allison."
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: In the morning...

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
"What!? How? Why?" you ask the two.

"Well it all started with the note you gave us Joey." she said handing it over to Jacie.

Hey, I know what happened to your friends, Jacie and I are really Jake and Joey. The note said.

"Sis, why would you do that!?" Jacie asked you.

"I didn't want to see her cry." you told her. "But why and how did you turn into the princes of Bollinia?"

"Well, when we read the note I quickly thought that I needed to stay in the area, and it turns out that Bollinia had a similar problem to Manonia. So I made a plan to turn into a prince. Allison came along because she didn't want me to be alone." Kelly said.

Jacie, furious at you calls the guards and has them escort the 'princes' away. Before leaving, Kelly yells, "See you at the ball!"

"Why!?" she yells at you.

"Because I didn't want kelly to worry, and is it really that bad. I mean look how cute they are!" you said.

"I know but I thought we agreed to leave our old life behind." she said.

"I know, but look on the bright side, you might be able to date a cute prince!" you told her. She smiled a bit. Then Alina and Veronika come in and help you get ready for the ball. You grab your red dress and Jacie her purple one and head into your separate changing rooms to chance.(http://stylesuccess.files.wordpress.com/...)
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: What!?

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
Jacie and you were escorted, by Alina and Veronika, to the ballroom. As you walked down the hallway, you found yourself having trouble breathing. Looking at Jacie, you say, "Its going to be a while before I'm used to wearing a corset."

Looking at you, Jacie says, "I know what you mean; it hurts to walk."

As you walked down the stairs, you turn to Jacie. "Are you still angry with me...for what I did?"

"A little bit," looking at you, she says, "You could've talked to me before giving the note to Kelly."

"I know I should've of, I'm sorry. But I'm sure you can see the plus side in all this."

"Yeah," Smiling, Jacie says, "Kelly, and Allison, turned into really cute princes."

"Yup," pausing, you say, "Are you going to tell father, and mother, what I did?"

Shaking her head, Jacie says, "I won't tell them. You're my sister, now, and sisters look out for eachother."


You arrive outside of the ballroom and see father, and mother, standing outside the door. Father was wearing a uniform covered in medals, while mother was wearing a gown similar to yours (http://oweddingdresses.blogspot.com/2009...).

Looking at you, Father says, "You look lovely, my daughters."

Curtseying, Jacie and you say, "Thank you father."

"I understand you met the Princes of Bollinia?"

"Yes," not wanting to say what happened, you say, "We had them brought to our chamber this morning, to meet them."

Mother, smiling, says, "That was nice of you."

Father then says, "Are you ready to go inside?"

"Yes father."

Nodding at the doorman, Father says, "We're ready."

The doorman opens the door and walks inside. Once inside, he announces, "Ladies and gentleman. Please welcome King Markus, Queen Sophie and," taking a breath, he continues, "Their daughters Princess Josefine and Princess Jacie."

As everyone starts clapping, Jacie and you follow Father and mother into the room.
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: At the ball

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
As Jacie and follow your parents into the ballroom, you look around at the hundred or so people in the room. Thinking to yourself, you say, "This is incredible!!"

Father and mother walk up to 4 people dressed in similar attire. It took a moment to recongize that two of them were Kelly and Allison. As the 4 of you stop, Kelly and Allison's father walks up to your father and says, "Markus, it is so good to see you again."

Smiling, Father says, "Same here Alexi."

After Alexi said hi to mother, he steps over to Jacie and you. Kissing each of your hands, he says, "Its a pleasure to finally meet you, m'ladys. My sons have been looking forward to this evening since their return."
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: Continue

choices: Later on (Vladimir/Kelly asks you to dance)
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
Looking over at Kelly and Allison, then back to Alexi, you say, "The pleasure is all mine, your majesty."

Alexi then gestured for Kelly and Allison to step forward. Not knowing that you'd already met them, Alexi says, "M'ladys, let me introduce you my my son's Vladimir and Nickoli."

Pretending to meet them for the first time, you reach out your hand and say, "Its an honor to meet you both."

Vladimir comes forward and takes your hand, "The honor is all mine, m'lady Would the lady care to have a dance later?" leaning in, Vladimir whispers, "It's me, Kelly."

Smiling, keeping up the act, you say, "I'd love to have a dance."

Father then leads Jacie and you over another group of people. Once there, you were introduced to Manonia's ambassador, and several Ministers. After the introductions the two of you follow Father, and Mother, over to the throne area. As you get closer you see 4 thrones; 2 larger ones, for Father and Mother, flanked by 2 thrones for Jacie and yourself.

Once Father and mother had taking their seats, Jacie and you sat down as well. After a moment, father stands up and walks to a podium. For the next 15 minutes, Father spoke about how happy he was to have his daughters back home.

Once the speech was finished, Father walked over to you. "Josefine, may I have the honor of dancing with my daughter?"

Smiling, you reach your hand out and say, "Yes father."
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: Continue (The ball)

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content: And the opening dance of the evening should be done by the king and his oldest daughter. Since you are born 10 minutes earlier then your twin sister, this honor and task is now yours. You remember your dancing lesson you took as Joey some years ago and you remember also that you hated them and you hate dancing. But now your female body or the magic was doing that you were a real great dancer and anyhow your father was leading the dance...
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: Dancing with your father

choices: After dancing (having a private conversation with Vladimir/Kelly)
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
After dancing with your father for another few minutes, he stopped and led you back to the throne area. As you walked back to the throne area, you spot Vladimir/Kelly grinning at you. Knowing what he was grinning about, you smile back.

Arriving back at the throne area, your father kisses you on the hand and says, "Thank you, Josefine, for giving me the opportunity to dance with my daughter."

Smiling, you curtsey and say, "You're welcome father."

Walking over to Jacie, your father says, "Jacie, may I have this dance?"

Smiling, Jacie says, "It'll be my pleasure, father."

After your father leads Jacie to the dance floor, you sit down in your throne. As you looked around at all the people in the room, you see your mother walking over to you. "Josefine, my dear, may I have a word with you?"

"Certainly mother."

Getting up, you follow your mother into an adjacent room. Closing the door, she looks at you and says, "I just had a talk with your sister; and thought it would be nice if we talked as well."

"Talk about what?"

"For starters." Stepping closer, your mom says, "How are you adapting to your new life, and gender?"

Thinking for a moment, you say, "Before all this happened, I never gave any thought to being a girl. But now, I can't imagine being anything else." smiling, you say, "I'm happy to be a princess, and your daughter."

"That's wonderful dear." Smiling, your mom says, "I understand you have a history with Alexi's sons?"

"Yes." pausing, you say, "I knew them back when I was a boy, and when they were girls."

"I see." grinning, your mom says, "Do I hear wedding bells in the future?"

Blushing, you say, "Mother!!"

Smiling, your mom says, "I'm just messing with you sweetie."

After that the two of you talked for a few more minutes, until returning to the ball room. Walking to the throne area, you arrive just as Jacie and your father finish their dance. After everyone takes their seats, your father gets up to announce that the floor was opening to dancing; and that any interested men could ask Jacie or you to dance.

As everyone starts to enjoy the party, you spot Vladimir and Nickolai walking over to you. Vladimir gets down on one knee and askes, "M'lady Josefine, will you do me the honor of having a dance with me?"

Blushing, you say, "I'd be honored to."
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: something else

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
You follow Kelly out to the dance floor; as Jacie follows Nickolai. Arriving on the dance floor you put your hands around Kelly's neck, as she puts her hands around your waist. Pulling you closer, she whispers into your ear, "You look beautiful Jake."

"Thanks." smiling, you say, "I never thought I'd like wearing outfits like this; but it's catching on."

As the two of start dancing, Kelly says, "I still can't believe Joey and you agreed to become a princesses."

"We originally thought they were going to make us princes'; but we found out differently when they made the announcement of our 'return.' At first we thought they were crazy when they said how we'd turn into girls; but once we found out they were right we decided to accept our new lives."

"We thought our 'parents' were crazy too; but then we remembered your note." pausing, she says, "It's a major change for all of us; but we'll get used to it."

The two of you continue dancing for a while; until Kelly leads you out to the balcony. Walking you over to a bench she, like a gentlemen, helps you get seated. As Kelly takes a seat next to you, you say, "Thank you."

Smiling, Kelly says, "Anything for you."

Hearing that you, remembering a high school dance from a few years ago, start giggling. "That reminded me of the first time you and I danced together."

Kelly thinks about that and says, "I remember that too; you said you'd do anything for me."

"Yup, that's right." pausing, you say, "T-that was also the first time I realized that I was in love with you."

"Really?" blushing, Kelly says, "That was when I realized I was in love with you too."

"Things sure have changed since then." pausing, you say, "Do you think there's a chance we'll...fall in love again?"

"I certainly hope so."

Looking at Kelly, you suddenly have the urge to kiss her. While the girl part of you wanted to kiss Kelly, the small part of you that was still a boy was hesitant. Realizing that you were no longer a boy, you decide to give into the urge. Standing up, carefully, you turn to face Kelly. "Stand up, Vladimir. I don't want to do this sitting down."

Standing up, Kelly says, "Do what?"

You never answer the question, as you wrap yourself around Kelly and kiss her on the lips. Neither of you could remember ever feeling so good; as you stood on the balcony kissing. After a few moments, you break the kiss and, smiling, say, "I didn't want to do that sitting down."

Smiling, Kelly gets back into her Vladimir personality. "I love you, Princess Josefine, and I have from the moment I laid eyes on you."

Smiling, you say, "I love you too, Prince Vladimir."

"When should we tell our parents?"

"We can tell them tomorrow over breakfast."

Grinning, Kelly drops her Vladimir personality. Whispering, she says, "I wonder if Joey and Allison are doing the same thing?"

Walking back to the ballroom, you say, "I don't know; maybe they are."

What the two of you didn't know was that Allison had escorted Joey to the room where you'd talked with your mother. The two of them had the same talk; where Allison admitted that, although she pretended to hate Joey and you, she was only hiding her feelings. The two of them had been kissing for the last 10 minutes.


The rest of the ball went by quickly; with Jacie and you dancing with some of the other guests. Once the ball was finished, Alina and Veronika escorted the two of you back to your room.

Walking into the room, you turn to Alina and Veronika. "I know this is highly unorthodox, princesses becoming such good friends with their servants, but we were wondering if you'd like to have a slumber party tonight?"

After discussing it with Veronika, Alina turned to you and said, "We'd be honored to, M'lady."
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: Dancing with Vladimir/Kelly

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
After helping Jacie and you into your nightgowns, Alina and Veronika left to get their things for the slumber party. After they left the room, you walked out of the bathroom and walked over to where Jacie was sitting on the couch.

Sitting next to her, you say, "So what do you want to do tonight? This is my first slumber party?"

Looking at you, Jacie says, "Well we could, I can't believe I'm saying this, give each other makeovers or something."

Before turning into a girl the idea of a makeover sounded boring. Now, however, you were excited. "That sounds like fun. What else?"

"Well my sister threw a lot of slumber parties. She would always talk about boys, or music. She, and her friends, would stay up all night talking, or singing."

"We can do that." pausing, you say, "We can find out if Alina or Veronika are seeing anyone."

Jacie, unknown to you, was feeling a little depressed all of a sudden. In a hushed voice, she says, "Yeah, that sounds fun."

Concerned, you look over at your sister and say, "Hey, Jacie, are you okay?"

"I'm fine." Looking at you, Jacie says, "It's just that talking about my sister is depressing."

You knew that Jake was close to his sister; since they were a year about in age. "You want to talk about?"

"Not really." getting up, Jacie heads towards the balcony, "I just want to be alone for a bit."

You watch as Jacie walks out to the balcony. While you wanted to give her some space, your new found twin telepathy told you something was wrong. Getting up, you walk outside to the balcony. Stepping outside you see Jacie standing by the railing, crying. Walking over to her, you say, "Come on Jacie, I know something's bothering you."

Looking at you, in tears, Jacie says, "Next week's Ashley's birthday; and I'm going to miss it."

Pulling Jacie into a hug, you say, "You miss your family, don't you?"

"Yeah, I do." Crying into your shoulder, Jacie says, "What about you?"

"I miss my family too." tearing up, you say, "But w-we have to put that behind us now; we're princesses now."

"I wish there was a way we could let them know we're alright." Looking at you, Jacie says, "I mean, they think we're dead!"

After thinking to yourself for a moment, you say, "I have an idea how we can let our families know we're okay."

"Really? How?"

"We talk father into letting us visit the States to see our families. We can tell them that we're okay, and happy with our new lives."

"That might work."

Hearing Alina and Veronika walking into the room, you say, "We'll talk to father tomorrow at breakfast." pausing, you say, "I have something else to tell him as well."

Looking at you, Jacie says, "Really? What?"

Blushing, you say, "I-I'm in love with Vladimir."

"Really!?" smiling, Jacie says, "What a coincidence!"

"How?"

"Nickolai and I are in love too!!"

"Wow!!" smiling, you say, "Who knew that we'd be dating princes'?"

After that the two of you walk inside to start the slumber party.
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: Continue

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
The four of you have a blast with the slumber party; staying up till 4am. You gave each other makeovers, had pillow fights, and had snacks brought up from the kitchen. You also found out that Alina was engaged to Sacha, your 'kidnapper;' and Veronika was dating Mickiel the photographer.

You were the first to wake up the next morning, around 7:30. Opening your eyes, you saw that everyone else was asleep; Alina and Veronika in sleeping bags on the floor; while Jacie and you were in sleeping bags on the couches. As you sat up you remember them insisting that Jacie and you sleep on the couches, saying that it would be inappropriate for the two of you to sleep on the floor.

Having the urge to pee, you quietly get up and walk to the bathroom. You were washing your hands a few minutes later when the door opened, to revealed a startled Alina. "So sorry m'lady. I didn't know you were in here."

Smiling, you say, "It's alright Alina. Come on in."

Alina hesitated for a moment, before walking over to the toilet. Sitting down, she says, "Did you enjoy the slumber party?"

"Yes, I did, very much." pausing, you say, "How about you?"

"I did as well, m'lady. Until Lady Jacie and yourself came, Veronika and I were the youngest people here. It's nice to have girls our age to spend time with." flushing the toilet, she says, "Even if they're members of the Royal Family."

"We feel the same way, Alina. Back when we were men, Jacie and I had friends, who were girls, that we'd occasionally hang out with. But," smiling, you say, "I must say that Veronika and yourself are the first we can consider girl friends."


Veronika and Jacie woke up a short time later. After everyone was awake Alina and Veronika went back to 'servent' mode; getting Jacie and you ready for the day. After dressing the two of you in matching sweater dresses (http://www4.jcpenney.com/jcp/X6.aspx?Grp...), and getting dressed themselves, Alina and Veronika escorted you to the dining room for breakfast.

You met up with Vladimir and Nickolai on the way down; as they were being escorted by their own servants. Wanting to say good morning to Vladimir, you look at Alina and say, "Could you give us a minute?"

Bowing, Alina says, "Of course m'lady."

You walked over to Vladimir, as Jacie walked over to Nickolai. Putting your arms on his shoulders, you say, "Morning my prince."

"Good morning Lady Josefine, you look beautiful this morning." Smirking, he says, "Are you sure you were a boy?"

"Quite Vladimir. If any part of me was still a boy," smiling, you say, "Would I do this?"

Vladimir never got the chance to ask what 'this' was, as you kissed him on the lips. As the two of you kissed, on the foyer, you thought to yourself, "Never in a million years would I have thought I'd be in love with a prince!! But this feels GREAT!!"

You stopped kissing a few minutes later, realizing you'd kept the servants waiting. Pulling away from Vladimir, you see Jacie pulling away from Nickolai. Smiling, you say to yourself, "Yeah, there's no way we're still boys."

Everyone arrived in the dining room a few minutes later. While Alina and Veronika helped Jacie and you into your seats, you saw Vladimir and Nickolai sit down directly opposite from you. After excusing Alina and Veronika you waited for Father, mother and Vladimir's parents to arrive.

You only had to wait a few mores, before you heard the door open. Standing up, with everyone else, you turn to the door as a servant says, "Announcing his majesty King Marcus and his wife, Queen Sophie."

You bowed as your parents entered the room, followed soon after by Vladimir's parents. Once everyone was seated, you sat down to breakfast.
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: The next morning

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
Breakfast was quite different from what you were used to in your past life. Jake's family was never one for talking at the table; so breakfast was always very quite. However now your mother and father were actively engaging Jacie and you in conversation. Looking at you, Father says, "Josefine, how would you and your sister like to get out of the palace for the day?"

Exchanging a glance with Jacie, who nods, you say, "We'd love to, Father. We're going a little stir crazy here."

"Lovely." smiling, Father says, "It's the perfect opportunity to present each of you with a present."

As if on cue, two servants came in; each of them carrying a box. Handing a box to Jacie and you, they leave the room. Looking at father, you say, "What's this, Father?"

"Open it and you'll find out."

Opening the box, you see a key to a Porsche. "Oh my! Thank you father!!"


After that, everyone went back to eating breakfast. After a few minutes you caught Vladimir giving you a glance. As you look at him, he mouths, "Tell them."

Getting the hint, you look at your parents and say, "Mother. Father. There's something Jacie and I have to tell you."

"Oh?" looking at you, Mother says, "What's that?"

Looking at Vladimir, you say, "We're in love with Vladimir and Nikolai."

Your parents, and Vladimir's parents, were very excited to hear the news. Mother got up to give Jacie and you each a hug. "I'm happy for you both. You deserve to be happy."
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: Breakfast

1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.content:
After about 10 minutes of dancing with Vladimir/Kelly you asked him to follow you to the balcony at the end of the dance hall so the two of you could talk in private, after reaching the balcony you turned to Vladimir/Kelly and began speaking.

"I never thought I'd see you as a Prince, how did you manage to do this?" You asked her curiously.

"I could say the same about you being a Princess, how about you tell me how you ended up like this." Vladimir/Kelly replied mockingly.

"I tell you what, I'll tell you everything you want to know, but you have to tell me everything I want to know after I'm done agreed?" You asked sounding like a professional haggler.

"Alright I can live with that kinda deal." he said in an agreeing tone. "So tell me how this all started, did that midnight tour have something to do with it?" He asked not beating around the bush.

"That's just like you Kelly, always paying attention to certain details, as a matter of fact the midnight tour had quite a bit to do with what happened." You said nervously.

"I thought so, well don't leave me hanging what happened?" He asked with a curious look.

"Well as I approached the castle, I noticed a sign on one of the walls saying something about a bonus for the first late-night tour customer about winning the chance to live like a Princess, I figured that it would've been better if it said 'Prince or Princess' instead, but hey, apparently no one else had done it yet or else the sign would've been down, so I decided to try my luck at being the first customer, needless to say I was the first late night customer though I didn't think this would be what that sign meant." You said blushing.

"What kinda bonus was you thinking about?" He asked

"I just thought they'd let me stay in the castle for a day like royalty and send me on my way with some money as a prize, sorta like one of those campbell's soup kids contests that used to appear on TV from time to time, but now I know otherwise" You said sheepishly.

"Oh I get where you're coming from, what about Jake how'd he get involved?" He asked.

"Well as I was getting ready to take the tour, Jake came running up behind me wanting a ticket, apparently he didn't want to be left out of a chance to tour the castle early either." You said chuckling.

"That still doesn't explain how he got involved," He said with a stern voice.

"Relax I'm getting to that, after Jake had asked for a ticket the guide asked me if Jake was with me, and I told him that he was, so the guide decided that since Jake was with me he would also get a prize as the second late night customer." You said.

"So Jake's timing is how he got involved? That's interesting, what happened next?" He asked.

"We started to follow the guide when he led us to a room and asked us to enter, and almost as soon as we did we fell into a trapdoor falling about 10 feet into a pile of hay with Jake following right behind me." You said.

"Ouch I bet that didn't feel very good did it?" He asked while laughing.

"Actually it didn't hurt me at all I don't know about Jake though." You said giggling.

"After that we followed the King and Queen into a hall where there they explained what the purpose of the sign was for." You said

"So what was the purpose of the sign?" He asked confused.

"To make a long story short, they needed us to be their heir, or rather heirs as the case may be, and while the King and Queen would've loved to have a biological heir of their own, it turns out they can't have children. To make matters worse, there was a rumor going around that they had a child, but were keeping her out of the country to avoid spoiling her and making her unfit to lead.
