While the rumor was that there was only one child, they were sure a rumor that the royal twins were coming home would make everyone forget that detail of the original rumor." You said taking a breath after that explanation.

"Sounds like they had a major problem on their hands." He said scratching his head.

"Believe me at the time it sounded like quite a story, and I wasn't even sure that they were even the real King and Queen yet, Jake seemed convinced though and wanted to do it, so they asked me if I wanted to do it as well, and after thinking about it for a few moments I decided to go ahead and do it as well, after agreeing they gave us a tour of our new home and sent us back to the hotel as to not raise suspicion." You said.

"Well you both did a good job hiding it from the rest of us most people would have been giddy as could be." He said teasingly.

"Sorry but we had to, if anyone found out, things could've ended up pretty bad." You countered.

"That's true, what about the kidnapping that happened the day after the class tour, that wasn't just a random kidnapping either was it?" He asked.

"Your quick to catch on, no that kidnapping wasn't a coincidence, the King and Queen had planned the whole thing out in advance as a way to get us away from the class without drawing any suspicion to them." You mentioned.

"That was actually a pretty clever idea and looks like it paid of." He pointed out.

"You're telling me, after the kidnapping happened we were taken to a room in the castle and waited there until after the King and Queen's formal apology and announcement of the arrival of their heirs, Princess Josefine and Princess Jacie at the same time." You said.

"About that, why exactly did they make you princesses?" He asked confused.

"Trust me, me and Jake were surprised as could be at hearing the name princess, so we asked the king and Queen about it, and as it turns out, Manonia is a matriarchal monarchy, meaning only Princesses can inherit the throne." You replied. "To add the finishing touches on the plan, they needed us to be on a plane so that we'd become their heiresses, and wouldn't just suddenly appear in the castle, the rest after that is pretty much what led up to this." You say finally finishing you explanation of how this all happened. "Okay I've told you how this happened to us, now it's your turn." You say eagerly.

"Alright here's how I ended up in my situation." He said as he started his story.
1551111111111111111111111111111111111211.title: After dancing (having a private conversation wi...

155111111111111111111111112.content: As you walk back to the bedroom, does something happen?
155111111111111111111111112.title: something else

15511111112.content:
Joey watched as the ticket seller closed the window; silently wondering if your teacher would be upset that Joey were doing this. Joey waited a moment before the seller came out a nearby door; holding what looked to be a lanyard with an ID on it.

Taking the lanyard, Joey said, “So what, are Jake the tour guide as well?”

“Normally I just sell the tickets; but the regular tour guide is out on the maternity leave.” Sounding annoyed by the fact that he was working this late, the man said, “So they have me doing the tours until she gets back.”

Joey followed the tour guide towards the palace; wondering what he was going to see once inside.

**************************


The tour itself was straight forward; staying away from the private rooms of the palace, while seeing places like the throne room and the ballroom. At that point the tour guide was called away for a moment; telling Joey to stay where he was until he got back.

Joey stood in the hallway for a few moments; admiring a painting of the royal family. He was starting to get bored of waiting when he heard what sounded like voices coming from down a nearby hallway.

His curiosity getting the better of him, Joey walked towards the voices. As he got closer, he was able to pick up some of the conversation; two people speaking in what sounded like Russian accents. He told himself that made sense since this nation shared a border with Russia. Stopping outside the door, Joey listened in. “What are we going to do, Dmitri? Our daughter is dead and she’s our only living heir.”

“There is one possibility, Isabella; but we have to be absolutely certain that it’s what we want to do.”

“That seems somewhat drastic, Dmitri; we’re talking about turning some girl off the streets into an exact copy of our daughter.”

Pausing, Isabella said, “How do we know she won’t ruin our daughter’s pristine image?”

“We’ll have to impress upon her the severe consequences if she does.”

Just then, as Joey was eavesdropping, the…
15511111112.title: The window closes and the tour starts.

155111111121.content:
Joey was so intent on eavesdropping that he wasn’t paying attention to his surroundings; so he was startled when the door in front of him suddenly opened to reveal an attractive middle aged woman. It did not take a genius to figure out that she was the Queen.

“Excuse me, young man; do you mind telling me what you’re doing?”

Getting nervous, Joey said, “I-I was on the-the tour and...”

“I’m sorry, your majesty.” Walking around the corner, the tour guide said, “I told this boy to wait in the main hallway; but I guess Americans don’t like to listen. I’ll inform security to have him thrown out.”

“That’s quite alright; Ivan; my husband and I will take care of the situation.”

“Of course, your majesty.”

Once Ivan had gone around the corner, the Queen turned to Joey and said, “Surely you know it’s rude to eavesdrop on people’s private conversations.”

“I’m sorry, your majesty; I-I let my curiosity get the better of me.”

“You might as well come inside; what you heard was not something we want the public to know about.” Stepping aside, the Queen said, “We have to know just how much you heard.”

As Joey walked into the room, he saw the King standing by a nearby desk. Walking over, the King said, “Tell me, young man; what is your name.”

“My name is Joseph Warner, your majesty; but everyone calls me Joey.”

“Well then...Joey; exactly how much did you hear?”

“I heard enough to know that your daughter is dead; and you’re going to replace her with some girl off the street.” Confused, Joey said, “How is that even possible; people will know the new girl isn’t the real princess.”

“No, they won’t.” sighing, the King said, “We have the means of altering ones appearance to such a degree that not even an autopsy will show any discrepancy.”

As the Queen joined her husband, Joey said, “Since this is obviously some state secret; I suppose you’re going to have to get rid of me somehow?”

“It’s unfortunate; but you’re right.” Pausing, the Queen said, “We can’t have you out in public knowing the truth.”

Surprised that he was even suggesting such a wild solution, Joey said, “I have solution that will benefit all of us; giving you your daughter back and keeping me alive.”

“Oh really?” her curiosity peaked, the Queen said, “What might that be?”

“Turn me into your daughter instead of some homeless girl off the street.”
155111111121.title: Door Opens

1551111111211.content:
Joey watched as the King and Queen stared at him in disbelief; unsure if they’d heard him correctly. The Queen was the first to speak. “I don’t think I heard you correctly; did you say...”

“Yes, I asked for you to make me your daughter.”

“Forgive me; but you don’t seem like the type of boy who would be happy as a girl, let alone a Princess.”

“That’s what makes me such a logical choice: I won’t be overwhelmed by everything.” Pausing, Joey said, “Think about it; it’s every girls dream to be a princess. If you picked some random girl off the street, she would probably squander the gift you gave her. This isn’t something I’ve dreamed about my entire life; so I wouldn’t take it for granted.”

“You realize of course that this is permanent; once you’re our daughter, you can never be a man again.” Looking at Joey, the King said, “There’s also the matter of your family; I doubt they would take too kindly to your sudden disappearance.”

“Screw my parents; they haven’t been there for me since I was 12 years old.” Sighing, Joey said, “I’ve basically been taking care of myself since I started high school.”

“That still doesn’t explain why you’d want to give up your own life for this.”

“Look; I know you’re surprised by my offer, and frankly I’m still surprised I even suggested it.” Pausing, Joey said, “I never had the best family experience growing up; my parents were always working and when they were home, they never had time for me or my sister. The fact that you’re willing to turn a complete stranger into a copy of your daughter shows just how much you loved her.”

“Those are all good points, Jos...Joey.” sighing, the King said, “However you must realize what being a Princess would require of you.”

“If it’s anything like in the Disney movies, I think I can handle a few Royal Balls or functions every now and then.” Chuckling, Joey said, “It’s not like I’ll be required to dress in some frilly, over the top gown every day.”

“Listen to what we’re saying, Joey.” Taking Joey’s hands in hers, the Queen said, “We appreciate your offer; but we’re offering a chance to back out of something you may not be ready for.”

“I’m a quick learner; I promise you won’t have to worry about me making some mistake that would embarrass the country.”

At that point, Isabelle turned to her husband and said, “As strange as it is that he suggested it, I think we should take him up on his offer.”

“You do realize if we do that, we’ll be turning a horny teenage boy into our daughter?” concerned, the King said, “Who knows how he might violate her body.”

“Excuse me, your majesty; with all due respect you have no idea what you’re talking about.” Pausing. Joey said, “I’ve never been anything but a gentleman to girls; I promise you I would never do anything like that.”

“Okay then.” Sighing, the King said, “Clearly you’ve convinced my wife, so I guess we’ll go forward with your offer.”

“Thank you, your majesty.” Smiling, Joey said, “You won’t regret this.”

“Don’t celebrate too quickly, Joseph.” Pausing, the King said, “We still have to find a way to explain how you ‘disappeared.’”

“That’s easy; lets just say I was wounded trying to prevent a kidnapping and I died on the way to the hospital.”

With a smirk, the King said, “You know; for someone who isn’t entirely keen on this, you seem to have put a lot of thought into this.”

“Believe me, I’m actually making this up as I go along.”

“Okay then; leave your contact information with my wife.” Pausing, the King said, “We’ll contact you tomorrow with the details.”

“Sounds good to me.” Getting up, Joey said, “I promise I’ll be the perfect daughter.”

“I have no doubt that you will...Natasha.” smiling, the Queen said, “We’ll see you tomorrow after the procedure.”
1551111111211.title: Continue

15511111112111.content:
Time seemed to pass by quickly for Joey after he left the palace; before he knew it, the sun was rising the next morning. As he sat up on the hotel bed, he could not help but feel a little anxious about what was going to happen today.

As he was getting up to go to the bathroom, he heard his phone vibrate; telling him he’d received a text. Looking at it, he saw that he’d gotten a text from an unknown number that said, “Alley by north end of Liberty Park; 8;30 AM.”

He knew exactly what that meant; but it did pose a problem for him. The group he was with was scheduled to leave for a museum tour at 8:00; he had to find a way to get out of it. As he got into the shower, he said to himself, “I suppose I could tell the professor I
was sick and couldn’t get out of bed; he might believe that.”

*************************


Sure enough the professor did believe him; and when 7:55 rolled around he was lying in bed when Jake walked into the room. “Are you sure you’re sick; and not trying to get out of this lame tour?”

“I really am sick, Jake; I guess I ate something last night that isn’t sitting too well with me.”

“Whatever man, I hope you feel better.” Chuckling, Jake said, “When we get back from the tour; perhaps you and I could hit the town and find some local girls.”

“Little does he know that I’ll soon be one of the local girls,” looking at Jake, Joey said, “Sounds like fun, man; see you when you get back.”

As Jake walked out of the room, he had no idea he would never see his best friend again. Joey stayed in for another 10 minutes or so to make sure everyone had left; once he was satisfied they had gone, he got dressed. Just as he was leaving the room, he looked around and wondered if there was anything he wanted to bring with him to his new life.

After thinking it over, decided to grab an old photo of him and his sister when they were kids. As he walked out of the room for the last time, he looked down at the photo and was amused by the fact that his sister was dressed as a princess; something which he
was about to become.

It didn’t take long for him to reach the alley; walking around until he saw a nondescript truck parked towards the end. As he made his way towards it, he wondered if those in the truck knew what was going on; if so he wondered how they felt about him becoming their princess.

Once he got to the truck, he was quickly surrounded by several people in uniform. Joey quickly realized they were Palace Security
guards. One of them walked over to him and, in a Russian accent, said, “Are you Joseph Warner?”

“Yes, I am.”

“We were beginning to think you wouldn’t show; that you would get cold feet about this.”

“Believe me, I don’t get cold feet.” Following the man inside the truck, Joey said, “I know it’s weird that I’m even considering this; but I figure becoming female is a small price to pay to have a better life for myself.”

“It is not my place to judge you for your decision.” Handing Joey a vest with what looked like small firecrackers on it, the man said,
“Put this on; at the push of a button it will simulate gunshot wounds.”

As Joey put the vest on under his shirt, he said, “What exactly is the plan here?”

Just then, as if on cue, a young woman appeared in the doorway at the front of the truck. She looked to be wearing a somewhat expensive outfit and looked like an exact duplicate of Princess Natasha. Walking over to Joey, she said, “The plan is that I’ll pretend to be the Princess while she’s walking through the park.” Pausing, she said, “At some point a security guard posing as a disgruntled citizen will shoot my bodyguards and kidnap me.”

“Let me guess; I’ll come to your rescue and get shot in the process?”

“That’s right.” Smiling, the girl said, “It’s too bad you’re going to become the princess; not only are you smart but you’re cute as well.”

It did not take long for Joey to get the rest of the details from the girl; whose name was Beatrice. Once everything was squared away, Joey said, “So I guess we should get this over with?”

“Sounds like a plan to me.” Smiling, Beatrice said, “Once this is done I look forward to being your bodyguard, Princess Natasha.”
15511111112111.title: The Next Morning

155111111121111.content:
As Joey waited for everything to start, he walked through the park. He had to admit it was a nice park, with ample tree cover and a nice fountain in the middle. Walking around, he said to himself, “Guess I should enjoy this while I can; the next time I’m here will be with bodyguards intent on protecting the princess.”

Realizing it was getting close to the time where everything would start, Joey made his way towards the park entrance. As he made his way there, he saw the horse drawn carriage carrying Beatrice heading towards the exit.

Stopping at the pre-arranged spot, Joey waited until his cue; watching as the crowd of onlookers waved and tried to snap pictures of the woman they thought was their princess. With a smirk, Joey said to himself, “I’m over here, you fools; I’m your princess.”

Just then, as planned, Joey heard gunshots and saw one of the guards fall to the ground. While the other guards scrambled to do their prearranged task, Joey ran towards the exit. He got there just as the last guard fell to the ground; leaving the ‘kidnapper’ an opening to jump onto the carriage and ride off with the panicking princess.

Even though he knew the carriage was going slow, Joey still had trouble catching up to it. He caught up as the carriage turned down what would become a dead end. Once there, Joey made his move. “Stop right there, you bastard!”

As Joey jumped on the carriage to ‘free’ the princess, the ‘kidnapper’ shot him several times; or so it would seem to any onlooker in the area. After pretending to scream in shock, Beatrice climbed out of the carriage. Looking at Joey, she said, “You did a fine job, m’lady.”

“Thank you; but please stop calling me that.” Running towards the van, Joey said, “I’m not the princess yet.”

Beatrice and Joey made it to the van just as a crowd of concerned citizens appeared. After hearing the gunshots, the idea was they would assume both Joey and the princess had been kidnapped. It could not have been further from the truth, as Joey was on the way to the hospital to become Princess Natasha of Manonia.
155111111121111.title: The Start of Joey's New Life

1551111111211111.content:
The ride to the hospital was the least uneventful thing to happen to Joey that day; he spent the ride talking with Beatrice while she was treating for a cut on the head she’d sustained when the carriage mistakenly drove onto the curb.

Looking at Joey, Beatrice said, “The...old Natasha hated this; so I figured I would let you know that you now have quite an extensive closet full of expensive, feminine clothing.”

“She hated all of that?” confused, Joey said, “I would have thought most girls wanted to be a princess and wear things like that.”

“So did I; but she wasn’t one of them.” With a smirk, Beatrice said, “Then again I never expected a boy such as yourself agreeing to be her replacement.”

“It gets me out of a bad family situation, alright?”

“Alright.” Pausing, Beatrice said, “Anyway, Natasha just wanted to be a normal girl; she hated all the expectations placed on her just because she was a Princess. I guess that’s why she tried to run away.”

“She ran away?”

“Yeah, three days ago.” Sighing, Beatrice said, “She decided she’d had enough and wanted to flee to have a normal life. I guess she must’ve been startled by something; because she tripped and fell 15 off the balcony onto concrete.”

“Is that how she died?”

“She’s not really dead; she’s just brain dead.” Shrugging, Beatrice said, “Since they’d rather the royal line continued, I guess they
decided to replace her.”

“Seems a bit drastic to me; but who am I to argue.”
1551111111211111.title: Trip to the Hospital

15511111112111111.content:
After arriving at the rear entrance of the hospital, Joey was escorted through deserted corridors to what he figured was a private room. Once inside the room, he saw the comatose body of the princess lying on a bed; life support machines keeping her alive.
Even without removing the blanket covering her body, Joey could tell she was attractive.

As he sat down on a nearby bed, he said to himself, “If I’m going to be a girl, I might as well be an attractive on.”

It seemed like an eternity before anyone else entered the room; a doctor entered the room followed by two nurses wheeling in with a large machine. With a thick German accent, one of the doctors said, “Hello, Mr. Warner.”

“Hi doc.” Gesturing to the machine, Joey said, “Is that going to make me the princess?”

“Correct.” Pausing, the doctor said, “We’ll hook it up to both of you; it will change you into the Princess while at the same time changing her into you.”

“I have to admit I’m curious about this procedure; is there any chance I could stay awake for this?”

“You’ll be awake the entire time; but pumped full of pain killers to keep you from feeling any pain.” Leaning into to whisper, the doctor said, “Don’t worry; if I were in your position I too would want to be awake while I became a girl...just out of sheer curiosity.”

It wasn’t long before Joey was stripped down to a hospital gown and lying on the bed; lying still as the doctors attached tubes from the machine to various places on his body. Joey’s curiousity was peaked when he saw the doctors attach what looked like suction cups to his chest. “What’s with those?”

“This machine will liquefy all of Natasha’s breast tissue; bring it through the machine to ensure there’s no abnormalities, and then solidify it under your skin.” Pausing, the doctor said, “This way, you’ll have Natasha’s breasts without invasive surgery.”

“That’s so cool.” Wincing as the nurse injected him with some pain killers, Joey said, “How long will this take?”

“The procedure itself should take about an hour; during which time you can watch TV or something.” Sighing, the Doctor said, “Once
I’m satisfied you’re healthy, then you’ll be released. It’s up to your...parents; but I see no reason for you not to begin your royal duties tomorrow.”

The doctor was ready to proceed not long after. After the nurses had left, Joey said, “Is it too late for me to change my mind?”

“No, it’s not; but I doubt you will.” Turning the machine on, the doctor said, “See you in an hour, Princess Natasha.”

Almost immediately Joey heard the machine start humming; as a tingling feeling washed over his entire body. He knew the changes had begun; he just could not see them yet.

*********************************


It had been almost 35 minutes and Joey was finally starting to see some changes to his body; for starters his arms and legs had lost muscle mass and became more slender. His hair was also growing out and getting darker. This was in contrast to Natasha’s body; which was getting bulkier and her hair was shrinking and getting lighter.

Up until that point Joey hadn’t felt anything due to the pain killers; but he suddenly started to feel a dull ache accompanied by a series of cracking noises from his waist. Looking down, he saw his skin shift; realizing his waist was realigning itself into a more feminine figure. Once that was done, Joey immediately felt a pressure building in his crotch.

Looking down, Joey watched as his male junk went erect one last time before changing into a fully functional vagina. Joey guessed he was about 75% female now; wincing as he felt the bones in his face start to crack and rearrange themselves.

It had been a while since he looked over at Natasha’s body; and while he was still male in some respects, she was no longer female at all. Thinking back to what the doctor had said about the breasts, Joey wondered when the machine would kick in; just as he felt a sharp stabbing pain in his chest.

Looking down, in shock, Joey watched as some sort of liquid rushed from the machine to the devices on his chest. The skin underneath startled to ripple and bulge; ballooning out until Joey was the proud owner of an impressive set of breasts. Something on the machine clicked and it shut down; giving Joey the sense that he was now female.

He was about to call out for someone when the Doctor entered the room. Disconnecting the machine, he said, “Well Joseph...or should I say Natasha; how do you feel?”

“I feel...” momentarily taken aback by his new female voice, with a Russian accent nowhere near as thick as the King and Queens,
Joey said, “I feel strange, but good. This voice will take some getting used to.”

While the nurses wheeled the machine and Natasha’s body out of the room, the doctor said, “I’ve called the Palace, the King and Queen are on their way here.”

“What will happen to Natasha’s body?”

“We’ve already contacted your...former parents and informed them of your accident.” Pausing, the Doctor said, “They’ll be here to tomorrow to say their goodbyes.”

“Okay then.” Sighing, Joey said, “If you don’t mind I’d like to sleep before my parents arrive.”

“Understood, m’lady.”

Once the doctor had left, a smile formed on Joey’s face as he closed his eyes and fell asleep.
15511111112111111.title: Goodbye Joey Warner, Hello Princess Natasha

155111111121111111.content:
The extensive physical changes must have drained Joey, because he did not wake up again until the next morning. Opening his eyes, he was startled by the appearance of breasts on his chest until he remembered what had happened the day before.

Looking around, after pushing hair from his eyes, Joey spotted the Queen sleeping on a nearby chair. Surprised to see such an important figure to this nation sleeping in such an undignified manner, Joey realized she must have been here all night. Before he could say anything, the Queen woke up and looked at him.

“Good morning, Natasha; I was worried you wouldn’t wake up.”

“I’m sorry...mom; but I guess the changes drained me a little.” Pausing, Joey said, “Were you here all night?”

“My daughter is in the hospital; I wasn’t going to leave until I knew you were leaving as well.”

“Thank you.” Touched by how quickly the Queen was treating him as her daughter, Joey said, “That means a lot to me that you would do that.”

“You made it clear that Joseph didn’t have a very loving family life.” Getting up from the chair, the Queen said, “I wanted to make sure your life as Natasha started out in a good way.”

“Thanks mom, I appreciate that.”

“Your father will be here in 45 minutes to bring us back to the Palace.” Gesturing to a nearby doorway, the Queen said, “There’s a shower in there, I suggest you make use of it.”

“Y-You want me to shower?” Getting out of bed, Joey said, “I’m sorry; but what makes you think I won’t be tempted to...take advantage of the situation.”

“I not only realize that; but I would be surprised if you didn’t.” pausing, the Queen said, “This is your body now, Natasha; it’s alright if you’re a little curious.”

“Okay.” Smiling as he headed towards the bathroom, Joey said, “I promise to be respectful.”
155111111121111111.title: The Next Morning

1551111111211111111.content:
Once he was in the privacy of the bathroom, Joey closed the door. As he stood in front of a full-length mirror, he thought this bathroom was more appropriate for a 5 Star Hotel then a hospital. He wondered if the room he was in was reserved for the special care of the royal family; figuring it would explain a few things.

Still getting use to his accent, Joey said, “Guess there have to be some perks to being royalty.”

It took Joey a few minutes to get the courage to take off the hospital gown; but when he did, he was not disappointed. He had always been somewhat on the overweight side as a boy; but as a girl, there was not an ounce of fat on his body.
“Damn, I look really good.” Admiring himself in the mirror, Joey said, “Not to judgmental or anything; but I look like the perfect girl.”

He was right in some regards about that; he was just the right height and weight for a girl his age, with a nearly flawless figure and an adorable face. “I can’t believe Natasha would give this up; she’s got the perfect body for a princess.”

Just as he was admiring his new body, there was a knock on the door. “Natasha, I know this is all new to you, but your father will be here in 20 minutes and I’ve yet to hear you in the shower.”

“Sorry mom.” Rushing to turn the shower on, Joey said, “I, uh, was caught up in the moment.”

******************************


Joey spent 15 minutes in the shower; taking the time to make sure every part of his body was clean. He initially found himself overwhelmed by how sensitive his new body was; especially water bouncing off hi breasts. He managed to resist the urge to explore; knowing that the Queen could hear him.

After getting out of the shower, he dried himself off and walked back into the room wearing nothing but a towel. Had he known what the Queen expected him to wear; Joey would have stayed in the shower.

Seeing the feminine dress, obviously made to accentuate his body, Joey said, “I-I can’t wear that.”

“Yes, you can.” Handing the dress to Joey, the Queen said, “Look, I know this is all happening fast; but as much as she hated it, Natasha always dressed like this when in public.”

“So basically I have to keep up appearances?” sighing, Joey took the dress and said, “I guess I could get used to wearing something like this.”

“That’s my girl.” Smiling, the Queen said, “I’ll help you adjust to everything, I promise.”

*********************************


With the help of the Queen, Joey soon found himself not only wearing the dress but also a pair of high heeled shoes. He was even wearing some light make up. Looking at the reflection in the mirror, Joey said, “Hard to believe I used to be a boy, right?”

“You look beautiful, Natasha.” Smiling, the Queen said, “Come on, your father is waiting.”
1551111111211111111.title: Getting Ready

15511111112111111111.content:
Even as they walked out of the hospital rooms, walking towards what Joey presumed to be an elevator, Joey couldn't stop fidgeting in the dress. "Nrrrgh....."

He couldn't really deny it; this dress was not comfortable at all. Lets's start from the top, literally. The dress was a nice cyan color, but that was the only thing that didn't bother him. It was sleeveless, completely showing his lithe arms and shoulders. He could feel the chill of the air-conditioning, actually making him fold his arms in front of his breasts. Speaking of which, the form-fitting dress did not leave much to the imagination. The tops of his breasts were clearly visible in the low cut. Joey was honestly a bit worried that if the dress went any further down, it would show his nipples.

The torso of the dress accentuated every little dip and curve of his body as well, but that wasn't the worst thing. The skirt part went down to just his knees, but Joey felt uncomfortable with how his legs rubbed together without any obstacles. He felt naked underneath. In addition, the heels were honestly not all bad, as they weren't too high, and clearly Natasha's feet were probably broken in to the heels, reducing the ache he felt. Still, getting used to the walk was tough enough, to when Joey was happy when they got into the elevator.

"Not very comfortable is it?" Joey jumped a bit when he saw the Queen smiling sincerely at him. "Don't worry. I can tell. Surely, this is the first time you're wearing a skirt and heels?"

"Y-Yes, very much so." Joey smiled weakly, letting the elevator take them down. "I'm sure I can get used to them though. Well....as best I can."

The Queen still gave him that understanding look. "That's alright. You can take all the time you want to get used to it. I certainly won't think any different of you."

"Thanks...mom." He added at the last second, giving the Queen a smile as the elevator doors opened.

Walking out, they passed by some workers, who wished them well as they opened the door for them. However, it wasn't too long before Joey found himself wishing he hadn't left. Practically right as he took his first step outside, there was a rush of voices. People and cameras all around had circled the place, bombarding question after question about the status of the princess, as well as "Joey" himself.

"I think I might respect movie stars a bit more now." Joey thought to himself. The questions alone were starting to make him dizzy. However, he soon felt some gentle but firm hands on his shoulders.

"Just follow me. Keep calm." the Queen said to him, curving their way through the mob. Thankfully, the car was just in front of them. The King himself was waiting there as well, looking as proud as you might expect. Joey suddenly found himself a bit apprehensive, finally standing in front of the impressive man as his daughter.

"Um....hello dad.." Joey said with a slight stutter, though not that noticeable.

The King didn't seem to mind, even offering a hug which Joey ended up walking into. Needless to say, it was a bit awkward, and that came from both sides. It didn't last too long, before they separated and Joey was helped into the car. The door then closed, finally muffling the voices outside.
15511111112111111111.title: Meeting the People

155111111121111111111.content:
Someone could have very easily sensed the tension in the car during the ride to the palace. Joey was sitting in the back, legs crossed, watching the scenery as the car drove through the city. He would occasionally turn and find the King just staring at him.

Clearly his discomfort was noticeable, because the Queen said, “Dmitri, stop looking at our daughter like she’s a leper; say something to her.”

Joey was glad at the Queen was accepting of him as the daughter; but like many girls he knew, he really wanted the approval of his new father. With a sincere smile on his face, Joey said, “I-I know this is strange for you...dad; but I-I hope we can both learn to accept this.”

Dmitri looked at his wife; hoping for a way out. When he saw none, he turned to Joey and said, “You may look like my daughter; you may even sound like her, but you have much to prove in order to show me you’re worthy of being her.”

He may have only known the King for a short time, but that wounded Joey deeply. He’d given up his own life in order to give these people their daughter back, and the King wouldn’t even acknowledge his sacrifice.

Thankfully they didn’t have much longer to be in the car. Once they got to the palace, everyone got out of the car. While Dmitri went inside, Joey turned to Isabella and said, “Wh-Why doesn’t...dad seem like to me?”

“He’s still coming to terms with everything; but trust me when I say he’ll come around eventually.” Looking at Joey, Isabella said,
“For now, I hope you realize that I love you so much. I can’t thank you enough for what you’ve done.”

“Thanks, mom.” Tearing up, Joey hugged Isabella and said, “You have no idea what that means to me.”

After the two women hugged for a moment, Isabella said, “Now come inside; it’s going to rain soon and I want to give you a tour of the palace.”

“I’ve already gotten the tour, mom.” Walking up the stairs, Joey said, “That’s how I ended up like this.”

“True; but I want to show you the private areas that were off limits to the main tour.” Pausing, Isabella said, “After all this is your home now; and I don’t want you to be lost in your own home.”:
155111111121111111111.title: Ride to the Palace

1551111111211111111111.content:
Joey and the Queen walked through the palace for what seemed like hours; but in fact could not have been more than 45 minutes. They went through room after room; Joey finding each room seemingly more extravagant then the last. When he wasn’t listening to the Queen talking about the rooms, Joey spend the time getting to know the woman who was now his mother.

As they walked through the halls, having just been through the arboretum, Joey said, “So, your majes...mom; how exactly did you and father meet?”

“We met while both of us were attending college in London.” Smiling, the Queen said, “I know it sounds terribly cliché, but it was love at first sight,”

“That sounds romantic.” Blushing, Joey said, “I never imagined I’d say this; but do you think I’ll find a man who loves me as much as father loves you?”

“I have no doubt that you will, Natasha.” Pausing, the Queen said, “Your past experience as a boy will no doubt help you in that
regard.”

“Thanks.” Smiling, Joey looked at his reflection in a nearby mirror. Turning to the Queen, running a hand through his hair, Joey said,
“I don’t really look, or feel, like a boy anymore; especially wearing this outfit.”

“I suspect it won’t be long before you, as they say, go native.” Stopping outside a closed door, the Queen said, “Perhaps this room will help you in that regard.”

“What’s special about this room?”

Opening the door, the Queen said, “It’s your bedroom.”

Walking past the Queen, Joey entered the room to find it was quite lovely. It was not at all like he’d expected; all the Disney movies had made it seem like a princesses bedroom was over the top in extravagance. This one could have passed for a moderately expensive condominium in New York; it was modern and brightly lit.

“Do you think I could have some time to myself?” Turning to the Queen, Joey said, “I enjoyed talking with you; but I’m still adjusting to this and would like some time to do that.”

“Of course, Natasha.” Hugging her daughter, the Queen said, “Take all the time you need.”
1551111111211111111111.title: Continue

1551112.content:
Just as I was about to turn off my Xbox, I heard a knock at the door. Getting up, I walked over and opened it to find my friend Jake standing there. Looking behind him, I saw his luggage was all packed. “Come on, man; we’re leaving.”

After packing everything into Jake’s car, I relaxed for the 15 minute drive to the airport. Once we parked in the Long Term Lot, we met our class at the entrance to the terminal. Seeing us, Professor Monroe walked over and gave us our tickets and an itinerary.

Walking into the terminal, I looked at the itinerary and saw that the first stop was a small country called and an itinerary.

Walking into the terminal, I looked at the itinerary and saw that the first stop was a small country called Moldavia; a small country in Central Europe.


After going through security, it was another 2 hours before the plane took off. Taking a seat by the gate, I plugged in my headphones and decided to read up on Moldavia on the internet.

The next two hours passed uneventfully; I either surfed the web or walked around the terminal. I was starting to get antsy when the plane finally started to board.
1551112.title: Moldavia

15511121.content:
Having fallen asleep during the 7 hour flight, I woke up just as the plane was beginning its decent. Looking out the window, I watched as the capital city of Alastra grew larger in the window. Of course that was all relative, considering that the capital was rather small in comparison to say London or Berlin.

The only noticeable landmark was the palace in the center of the city; resembling Buckingham Palace more than one I might find in a storybook.
It wasn’t long before you got through customs and arrived at the hotel; where Professor Monroe handed out room keys. After telling us the plan
for the next few days, we all went up to our rooms.

After unpacking your things in the room, I saw Jake lie down. Turning to him, I said, “Come on, Jake! We’re in a foreign country.”

“I’m tired, man; I didn’t sleep on the plane.”

“Fine.” Shrugging, I said, “I’ll see you later then.”

After grabbing my phone and wallet, I left the room and made my way to the lobby. Once outside the hotel, I decided to take a walk towards the palace. As I walked, I figured I had time to tour the palace before getting back for curfew.


Arriving at the palace, I saw that there were very few tourists walking around. Spotting a ticket booth, I walked over. As I walked over, I spotted a banner advertising the chance to ‘live like a princess.’

With a chuckle, I went to the booth and said, “I’d like one ticket please.”

After handing me the ticket, the attendant pointed me towards a nearby door. “You’ll have to use the side entrance, as the main entrance is being worked on.”

Walking towards the door, I opened it and stepped inside...only to fall about 15 feet into a pile of hay.

“What’s going on here!?”

Before I could get up, I heard a door open. Turning in that direction, I saw two silhouettes standing in the doorway.
15511121.title: Landing in Moldavia

155111211.content:
Looking at the silhouette, I said, “What’s going on here?”

I was momentarily blinded as a light was turned on. Once my vision returned, I saw two finely dressed middle aged people standing in the doorway. “Welcome to the Royal Palace.” Looking at me, the woman said, “I’m Helena, Queen of Moldavia; and this is my husband King Harold.”

“Please tell me what’s going on here!”

“All in due time, young man.” Smiling, The Queen said, “Come with us; and we’ll explain everything.”

I hesitantly got up and followed them out of the room; only to find myself in an ornately decorated hallway. It wasn’t long before I was led into a small room; with a table and chairs. Taking a seat across from them, I said, “What’s going on here?”

“We’ll get right to the point, Mr. Warner.” Looking at me, the King said, “We need you to be our heir.”

“What?” confused, I said, “Don’t you have children for that?”

“Unfortunately, we don’t have children of our own.”

I was shocked by that; as I’d read about a daughter living in the US. “What about your daughter in the US?”

“That’s only a rumor; about how we sent her to live in the States to keep her from being spoiled.”

“What does this have to do with me?”

Looking at me, with a serious tone, The Queen said, “We want you to be our daughter.”

I wasn’t sure if I’d heard correctly. “Excuse me?”

“We’re getting on in years; and are in need of an heir.” Looking at me, the King said, “If you agree, you’ll become our daughter and live here in the palace.”

“There’s only one problem with that.” Pausing, I said, “I’m not a girl.”

“That’s not a problem.” In a serious tone, the King said, “We’ve invested in a way to make you our biological daughter.”

“What if I don’t agree to this?”

“Then you’re free to go; we won’t bother you again.”

I sat back and considered my options. It was a tempting offer; become a member of the royal family and live in luxury. The only downside was that I’d be a princess instead of a prince.

After thinking for a moment, I turned to them and said...
155111211.title: Continue

1551112111.content:
“I’ll do it.”

“Excellent.” Smiling, the King said, “Perhaps you’d like a tour of your new home?”

“Sounds like a good idea to me.”

I spent the next couple hours following the King and Queen around. As they showed me the various rooms, they kept saying how much I’d love
living here.

As the tour ended, I said, “What’s going to happen to my family?”

“As far as anyone else is concerned, you disappeared during a class field trip.”

“Okay.” Sighing, I said, “When does this all start?”

“Tomorrow morning; you’ve had a long day.”

It was then that a girl in her mid 20s walked up to me; wearing a modest outfit. With a smile on her face, she bowed and said, “I’m Melina; your personal servant.”

“Hi, Melina.” Pausing, I said, “I’m Joey.”

“Hello, Joey.” Smiling, she said, “May I show you to your room?”

“Of course.”

As I turned to follow Melina up a flight of stairs, the King and Queen said, “See you in the morning, Mr. Warner.”


It wasn’t long before I found myself outside a set of closed doors. Looking at me, Melina said, “Here’s your room, Joey.”

Opening the doors, I found myself in a room that was about the size of my room and my parents room combined. I saw a king-sized canopy bed; with a walk-in closet and a bathroom. I didn’t look in the closet, but I figured that it would be filled with high-end clothing for a princess.

I also saw a desk with a top of the line laptop resting on it. Turning to Melina, I said, “Thank you, Melina.”

Bowing, she said, “Pleasant dreams, Joey.”

After Melina left, I turned and headed to the bathroom. As I looked at the Jacuzzi tub, I thought about what I was doing. I was giving up my family and my life to become a princess; something which I never thought possible.


I finally got to bed around 9:30; wondering what the next day had in store for me.
1551112111.title: I'll Do It

15511121111.content:
I woke up early the next morning. After going to the bathroom, I turned on the TV to hear a story about the return of the Moldavian princess.

I was sitting on the couch when the door opened. Turning that direction, I saw Melina standing there. “Morning, Melina.”

“Good morning, Joey.” Stepping forward, she said, “Are you ready?”

“As ready as I’ll ever be.”


Melina led me through the palace; passing by several servants. Everyone we passed looked at me; making me realize that they knew I’d be the princess shortly.

It wasn’t long before Melina and I arrived in a secluded hallway. As we got closer, I saw the King and Queen standing by a door. It dawned on me that soon I’d be calling them father and mother.

As we stopped in front of them...mother said, “Thank you, Melina; you may go now.”

“Of course, your highness.” Turning me, bowing, she said, “Good luck, m’lady.”

I couldn’t help but blush at that, as I was ushered into a room with a makeshift operating table. Turning to...my parents, I said, “How exactly will I become your daughter?”

“You’ll be injected with special nanites that will rewrite your DNA; making you a girl and our biological daughter.”

As I sat down on the table, I said, “Will it hurt?”

“You’ll be sedated for the procedure.” Looking at me, Mother said, “When you wake up, you’ll be our daughter.”

That was the last I remembered, as I was soon given the sedative.
15511121111.title: Becoming a Princess

155111211111.content:
I don’t know how long I was sedated; but when I woke up, I found myself back in my bedroom. Opening my eyes, I immediately realized that my vision was being obstructed by a pair of breasts.

Sitting up, I looked under the covers to find that I had a pair of decent sized breasts; probably about a C cup, maybe a little larger. Climbing out of the bed, I made my way to the bathroom to look at the rest of the changes.

What I found astounded me; the nanites had turned me from an average guy into an attractive girl, with long brown hair and green eyes. Looking further, I realized that I had a decent figure; I could probably model if I ever wanted to.


After admiring my body for a few minutes, I grabbed a nearby bathrobe and walked back into the bedroom. I hadn’t been there long when there was a knock on the door; followed by Melina peeking her head through the door. “May I come in, m’lady?”

“Come on in, Melina.”

That was the first time I’d heard my new voice; and it sounded quite nice, almost angelic. Walking into the room, Melina said, “Begging your pardon, m’lady; but you look lovely.”

“Thanks.” Turning to her, I said, “I could get used to this.”

“I’d love to talk more; but the King and Queen have requested your presence in their chambers.”


It wasn’t long before Melina had me sitting at a nearby vanity; where she did my hair and makeup. Once that was done, she went and grabbed a casual dress (http://www.jcpenney.com/dotcom/women/fai...) from the closet.

Looking at it, I said, “That looks...nice.”


It was only a few more minutes before Melina had finished getting me ready. After helping me with my shoes, she looked at me and said, “M’lady, may I ask you personal question?”

Having an idea what she wanted to ask, I said, “You want to know why I agreed to this?”

“Yes.” Looking at me, Melina said, “Why would you give up your old life to become a princess?”

“Let’s just say I didn’t have the best family life at home; my parents divorced when I was 10, and I lived with my mom mostly.”

“So you view this as a chance to live a life with loving parents?”

“Yes.” Chuckling, I said, “Even if it means I’m going to be a princess.”


After talking for a few more minutes, Melina helped me to my feet and led me out of the room.
155111211111.title: Waking up

1551112111111.content:
Melina led me to my...parent’s chambers; where she left me outside the door. Knocking on the door, I waited until someone opened it. It wasn’t long before mother opened the door; smiling when she saw me.

“You look beautiful, Katrina.” Pausing, she said, “Just as I always dreamed my daughter would look.”

“Thank you.” Smiling, I said, “Katrina?”

“That’s your name now.” Leading me into the room, she said, “You’re now Katrina Isabelle, Princess of Moldavia.”

I repeated the name a few times; letting it role off my tongue. Smiling, I said, “I like the way it sounds.”

I followed mother onto a nearby enclosed patio; where father was reading a book. Standing next to me, mother said, “Harold, let me introduce your daughter.”

Looking up from his book, father smiled and said, “You look lovely, Katrina.”

Blushing, I said, “Thank you, father.”

Gesturing for me to sit down, father said, “This must be somewhat of a shock for you; given that you were a boy.”

“It’s going to take some getting used to. But,” smiling, I said, “I’m confident I made the right decision.”

“Good.” Sitting down, Father said, “Now we’d like to go over what’s going to happen next.”


Mother and father proceeded to explain that I’d be taken by car to the airport; where I’d board a plane and fly around for several hours. After landing, I’d be taken to a podium where I’d be ‘welcomed’ back to my home.

Looking at me, Mother said, “I hope this isn’t too much for you, Katrina.”

“Its fine, mother; I can handle it.”


After having a quick breakfast, Melina returned and led me to a waiting car. From there we were driven the airport and ushered onto a waiting private plane.
1551112111111.title: Continue

15511121111111.content:
I’d never flown in a private jet before; so this was quite the enjoyable experience. I’d spent the last couple hours with Melina, as she taught me the basics when it came to acting like a girl.

It was getting close to 5:30 when the co-pilot informed as that it was time to land. Melina and I took our seats; looking out the window at the city below. As we approached the airport, I spotted a sizable crowd gathered outside a hangar.

It didn’t take a genius to realize they were there for me.

The plane landed about 10 minutes later; once it came to a stop, Melina led me to the door. Looking at me, she said, “Are you ready, m’lady?”

“Yes.” Taking a deep breath, I said, “I’m ready.”

It was then that the co-pilot opened the door; exposing me to thunderous applause and bright lights. As I slowly stepped out of the plane, I saw that large crowd was only about 40 or so people.

Once at the bottoms of the steps, I turned to Melina and said, “This is really impressive.”

“Get used to it, m’lady.” Smiling, Melina said, “This is how royals are treated.”

Taking the hint, I turned and waved at the crowd. Melina led me towards a nearby podium where mother and father were waiting. As I walked, I caught sight of Jake and my classmates.

I began to wonder why they were here; when I realized they probably wanted to catch a glimpse of the princess.

I met mother and father in front of the podium where, as we’d planned, we greeted each other. After that was finished, I was led up the steps as father gave a speech saying how nice it was to have me home.


After father gave a speech, I gave short speech about how nice it was to finally come home. Once the applause had died down, I was led to a waiting limo with mother and father.

Taking a seat in the limo, I said, “That was definitely an interesting experience.”

“Can you blame them, Katrina?” looking at me, mother said, “Their princess has returned home after so many years.”

Sitting back in the seat, I said, “I can’t wait until I can get in bed and relax.”

Smiling, Father said, “You’ve earned some rest, Katrina.”


Once we got back to the palace, I followed Melina up to my room where I got ready for bed.
15511121111111.title: Later on

155111211111111.content:
My first full day as a princess began around 9:30 the next morning; when I was awoken by the sound of curtains being opened. As my eyes adjusted to the light, I saw Melina standing at my bedside, “Morning, Melina.”

“Good morning, m’lady.”

Sitting up, I said, “What’s on the schedule for today?”

“Nothing, really.” Helping me out of bed, Melina said, “Your parents wanted you to have a relaxing day.”

Walking to the bathroom, I said, “What do you suggest I do?”

“If m’lady is interested; there is a horse stable on the grounds.” Looking at me, Melina said, “You could go horseback riding.”

“That sounds nice.” Sitting on the toilet, I said, “I assume I have an outfit for that?”

“Yes, m’lady.” Turning on the bath, she said, “While you take a bath, I’ll get your clothes ready for the day.”

Chuckling, I said, “Thank you, Melina.”

“You’re welcome.”
155111211111111.title: The Next Day

1551112111111111.content:
After taking a bath, I dried off and went back to my room. Once there, Melina helped me into my riding outfit. After making sure I was comfortable, she dismissed herself for a few minutes. I took the time to go over and check out of the computer; logging in to find that it had everything I’d need, Skype, email, internet, etc.

I was playing around with the computer when I heard footsteps, looking up to find Melina wearing her own riding outfit.

Looking at her, I said, “You look good, Melina.”

Smiling, she said, “Thank you, m’lady.”


We got out to the stables a few minutes later; to find almost a dozen horses waiting for us. Melina led us down to the end; where I saw two horses waiting for us.

Melina went up to one and gave it an affectionate pat on the nose. “Is that your horse?”

“Yes, his name is Cinnamon.” Turning to me, Melina said, “It was a gift from the King and Queen.”

“A gift?” confused, I said, “No offense, but why would...my parents gift a horse to a servant?”

It was then that Melina got a sad look on her face. Looking at me, she said, “It’s a long story, m’lady.”

Getting onto the other horse, I said, “I’d like to hear it.”

As we rode out of the stables, Melina said, “I was orphaned when I was 10 years old; the King and Queen took me in.”

“They raised you?”

“Yes, they did.” Sighing, Melina said, “I guess you could say I was their surrogate daughter; they took great care of me and I’ve lived a wonderful life here.”

“How did you end up being a servant?”

“I wanted to help them; to so my appreciation.” As we rode towards some trees, Melina said, “I did odd jobs at first; until they trusted me enough to be your servant.”

Looking at Melina, I said, “In a way, I guess that makes us sisters?”

Chuckling, Melina said, “I guess it does.”


Melina and I rode around for a few hours; occasionally racing each other; before stopping to rest. Sitting against a tree, I said, “I could definitely get used to being a princess.”
1551112111111111.title: Horseback Riding

15511121111111111.content:
Melina and I rode around for a little while longer; until a thunderstorm loomed in the distance. After putting the horses back in the stable, we made it back to the palace just as the rain started.

Adjourning to my room, Melina helped me into a more causal outfit. “I’m going to change, m’lady; I’ll return with food for you.”

“Thank you, Melina.”

Once Melina left, I walked over to the couch and sat down. Reaching for the remote, I turned on the TV and turned to the BBC. I wasn’t surprised when I found they were doing a story about the return of the Moldavian princess; chuckling at the thought that I was now famous.


I didn’t have to wait long before Melina returned. Seeing a tray of food, I said, “What’s that, Melina?”

“This is a local delicacy, m’lady; you’ll enjoy it.”

Looking at the tray, I saw a dish with what appeared to be pork and chicken. Never one to pass up an opportunity to try new things, I grabbed the fork and took a bite.

A smile appeared on my face; looking at Melina, I said, “That’s delicious!”

Placing the tray on the table, Melina said, “Would m’lady like to be alone?”

Looking at Melina, I said, “You can stay, Melina.”
15511121111111111.title: Continue

155111211111111111.content:
After I finished eating lunch, I allowed Melina to have the rest of the afternoon off. Once she left, I wondered what I could do for the rest of the day.

After thinking for a few minutes, I finally decided to explore the palace some more. After all, as I walked out of the room, I realized it was now my home.


I walked through the palace for what seemed like hours; exploring a lot of the rooms as I went along. It wasn’t long before I found myself outside a large, private library.

Walking inside, I glanced at some of the titles and saw some of them were first editions of classic novels.

I wasn’t aware anyone else was in the room, until I heard a voice say, “Hello, Katrina.”

Turning around, I saw mother walking towards me. “Hello, mother.”

Looking at me, she said, “How are you coping with your change?”

“It’s going to take some getting used to; after all, I was a guy yesterday.”

“I’d be more than happy to help you adjust to your new gender; as I’m sure Melina will be as well.”
155111211111111111.title: Later on

1551112111111111111.content:
Mother then proceeded to lead me through the library. As I followed her, feeling uncertain, I said, “Can I ask a question, mother?”

“Of course, Katrina.” Smiling, Mother said, “What’s on your mind?”

“I’ve been thinking.” Sitting down on a nearby couch, I said, “I have no idea what’s expected of me as a princess.”

Giggling, mother said, “No princess does, my dear.”

“Can you give me some pointers?” sighing, I said, “I did kind of jump into this role.”

“It all depends on many things.” Looking at me, mother said, “Our nation is in relative peace, so you’ll be expected to be seen in the open and happy at all times to help keep that peace.”

“What would happen if something bad were to happen?”

“Say our people are experiencing unrest due to a bad economy or a natural disaster.” Looking at me, Mother said, “Then you’d be expected to say behind the palace walls where it’s safe.”

“Thanks.” Looking at mother, I said, “I was actually wondering was expected of
me...in general.”

“You’ll have to learn how our nation is run; who our friends and enemies are.”

Pausing, mother said, “You’ll also have to learn to talk to the people.”

Chuckling, I said, “Sounds kind of complicated.”

Hugging me, Mother said, “We’ll help you through it, sweetheart.”
1551112111111111111.title: Talking with Mother

15511121111111111111.content:
After having that talk with mother, I left the library to continue touring the palace. As I expected, seeing as I was the princess, the palace staff was very polite as I passed by.

I was making my way back to my room, when I saw father approaching me. Smiling, I said, “Hello, father.”

“Hello Katrina.” Smiling, he said, “How are you today?”

“I’m fine.” Chuckling, I said, “Just exploring the palace; it’s quite big.”

“You’ll have plenty of time to explore it, daughter.” Looking at me, he said, “In the mean time, I’ve got something to give you.”

“Oh?” seeing a small box in father’s hand, I said, “What’s that?”

Handing me the box, father said, “Open it and find out.”

Taking the box, I opened the box to find a set of car keys. Shocked, I said, “You’re given me a car!?”

“Yes, sweetie.” Looking at me, Father said, “It’s a BMW F12 (http://www.google.com/imgres?hl=en&clien...); for when you want to leave the palace.”

A smile on my face, I hugged father and said, “Thank you, father.”

Hugging me back, father said, “Only the best for my daughter.”
15511121111111111111.title: A Gift From Father

155111211111111111111.content:
After talking with father, I decided to check out my new car. Father said that it was in the motor pool; but I didn’t know where that was. I was walking through the palace when I met up with Melina in a hallway.

Seeing me, bowing, Melina said, “Greetings, m’lady.”

“Hello, Melina.” Smiling, I said, “Could you tell me where I might find the palace motor pool?”

“Of course.” With a bow, Melina said, “Right this way.”


I followed Melina through a series of corridors before we came to a closed door. Opening the door, Melina let me inside before following.

Looking around, I found myself in a room filled with about 2 dozen cars; ranging from limos to sports cars.

With the keys in hand, I pressed the ‘locate’ button. I heard a ‘beep’ from the second to last car. Melina and I walked down the aisle to find the brand new car waiting for me.

With a grin on my face, I said, “It sure beats the car I drove before.”

“Is m’lady pleased with the car?”

“Oh yes; very pleased.” Turing to Melina, I said, “Care to go for a drive?”

“Maybe some other time, m’lady.” Looking at me, Melina said, “It’s almost time for dinner.”
155111211111111111111.title: Continue

1551112111111111111111.content:
Dinner was pretty similar to what I’d experienced at home with my old family; I sat at an elegant table with mother and father while the kitchen staff served us food. We talked more about what being a princess would be like for me; how it might take me a while to adjust.


After a nice dinner; which consisted of various Moldavian delicacies, Melina led me back to my room so I could unwind. Once in the privacy of my room, I said, “Melina; I think I’d like to take a bath.”

“Of course, m’lady.” Smiling, Melina said, “I’ll prepare it for you.”


I spent 45 minutes or so in the bath; relaxing in the warm water as I thought about my new life. Once I was dried off, Melina got me ready for bed. I wanted to be well rested when my former classmates came by tomorrow.
1551112111111111111111.title: Dinner

15511121111111111111111.content:
I woke up the next morning just as Melina was walking into the room with a tray of food. "Good morning, m'lady; how are you this morning?"

"I'm doing well, Melina." Sitting up in bed, I said, "Have my classmates arrived yet?"

"I've been told they're on the way; and will be here within the hour."


After eating the breakfast, which consisted of a simple bowl of cereal and some toast, Melina helped me get ready for the day. As we stood in front of my full length mirror, I turned to her and said, "Do you have any advice for me, Melina? I-I have to act like I've never met my classmates before today; which I'm not sure I can."

"I can't even begin to understand how...awkward that's going to be for you, m'lady." Stepping in front of me, Melina said, "But if what you've told me about your former life is true; it's obvious to me that while you didn't have a good home life; your classmates were always kind to you."

"If I tell them, what's to stop them from thinking I'm crazy?"

"Don't tell all of them then." Taking my hand, Melina said, "Simply tell those who you were closest to. Who knows; they may find it hard to believe at first but they could very well be willing to help you adjust to your new life."

"Yeah, what's to stop them from telling my old parents?" sighing, I said, "I haven't fully come to terms with all of this; but I know the King and Queen love me unconditionally as if I'd always been their daughter. I don't want my old parents to come and take that away from me."

"The King and Queen won't let that happen, m'lady." Smiling, Melina said, "Neither will I; I won't let anyone take you against your will."

"Thank you, Melina." Hugging her, I said, "That really helps a lot."
15511121111111111111111.title: The next day

info.description:
Interactive story number 7. Please update! I don't want to do this by myself.

100 Gift Points are given for a review.
20 Gift Points are given for each chapter updated (I only have so much).

Here are the rules:

1. Keep it PG-13 or lower!
2. You can have sex, but not descriptive and try not to have too much.
3. Keep language PG-13 and also keep it tame (like not cursing every sentence)
4. Keep the story going and no killing the characters.


Here's the story:

A character of your choosing, by many ways, is forced to become a princess. There, a journey begins.

Your character either becomes an original princess or a princess from a video game (Peach, Zelda, etc.).

This time, character bios and info will be found in the story.
